aho ngaho baraharara mbere yo kwambuka. 
nyuma y’iminsi itatu, abatware b’imbaga banyura mu ngando.
ni ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’uhoraho, imana yanyu, 
ubwo muzahereko muva aho muri, maze mubakurikire;
bityo muzamenye inzira mugomba kunyura,
kuko iyo nzira nta bundi mwari mwayinyura. 
ariko hagati yanyu na bwo, hajye hasigara intera ireshya n’imikono ibihumbi bibiri; ntimukabwegere.
hanyuma yozuwe abwira rubanda, ati «mwitagatifuze.
ejo uhoraho azakora ibitangaza hagati yanyu.»
yozuwe abwira abaherezabitambo, ati «nimuheke ubushyinguro bw’isezerano.
maze mutambuke mujye imbere y’imbaga.» baheka ubushyinguro bw’isezerano.
maze bajya imbere y’imbaga barayiyobora.
uhoraho abwira yozuwe, ati «uyu munsi ndatangira kukubahiriza mu maso ya israheli. 
kugira ngo bamenye ko nzaba ndi kumwe nawe nk’uko nabanye na musa.
naho wowe, uhe iri tegeko abaherezabitambo baheka ubushyinguro
uti ’nimugera ku nkombe y’amazi ya yorudani, muhagarare muri yorudani.’»
yozuwe abwira abayisraheli, ati «nimwigire hino maze mwumve ijambo ry’uhoraho, imana yanyu.
nuko yozuwe aravuga ati «ibi ni byo muzamenyeraho ko imana nyir’ubuzima iri muri mwe.
kandi ko izamenesha mubyirebera umukanahani, 
dore ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’umugenga w’isi yose bugiye kubabanziriza muri yorudani. 
mufate abantu cumi na babiri mu miryango ya israheli.
umuntu umwe muri buri muryango. 
ubwo abaherezabitambo baheke ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’uhoraho.
nibaba bagishinga ibirenge mu mazi ya yorudani, ako kanya amazi ya yorudani azamanuka 
amazi ava mu masoko aracikamo kabiri, 
maze amazi yibumbire mu kizenga kimwe cy’uruzi.
nuko imbaga isohoka mu mahema yayo kugira ngo yambuke yorudani, 
naho abaherezabitambo bahetse ubushyinguro bw’isezerano bayigenda imbere.
abahetse ubushyinguro bw’isezerano bagikandagira mu mazi yo ku nkengero,ahita akama
koko kandi amazi ya yorudani asendera ku nkombe zombi igihe cyose cy’isarura 
ako kanya amazi yamanukaga ava mu masoko arahagarara.
maze yibumbira hamwe icyarimwe kure cyane ahitwa adama
umugi uri hafi ya saritani, naho amazi yamanukaga ajya mu nyanja ya araba
maze imbaga yambukira ahateganye na yeriko.
nuko abaherezabitambo bahekaga ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’uhoraho.
bahagarara ku butaka bwumutse muri yorudani rwagati
israheli yose yambukiraga ahumutse.
abaherezabitambo ntibanyeganyega kugeza ubwo imbaga yose yari imaze kwambuka yorudani.
ubwo imbaga yose imaze kwambuka yorudani, uhoraho avugana na yozuwe.
fata abantu cumi na babiri muri rubanda.
umuntu umwe muri buri muryango,
maze ubategeke uti ’mukure hano muri yorudani nyirizina isomo.
aho ibirenge by’abaherezabitambo byari bihagaze muhakuere amabuye
muyambukane maze ayo mahema muyashinge aho muza kurara.’»
nuko yozuwe ahamagara abantu cumi na babiri yari yatoranyije mu bayisraheli,
umuntu umwe muri buri muryango w’abalevi. 
maze yozuwe arababwira ati «nimunyure imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho, imana yanyu.
mugane rwagati muri yorudani, maze buri muntu atware ibuye ku rutugu.
uko niko imiryango y’abayisraheli ingana.
kugira ngo ibyo bizababere ikimenyetso muzahorana. 
abahungu banyu bazababaza bati ’aya mabuye abibutsa iki?
ni uko amazi ya yorudani yacitsemo kabiri imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’uhoraho,
igihe bunyuze muri yorudani! amazi ya yorudani yacitsemo kabiri.
none aya mabuye azahora atubera urwibutso, twe abayisraheli.
nuko abayisraheli bagenza uko yozuwe yabategetse.
batora amabuye cumi n’abiri yo muri yorudani rwagati
nk’uko uhoraho yari yabibwiye yozuwe, bakurikije umubare w’imiryango y’abayisraheli
maze barayajyana bayageza ku ngando baba ari ho bayashyira.
yozuwe ashingisha amabuye cumi n’abiri muri yorudani rwagati.
bayashinga aho abaherezabitambo bari bahetse ubushyinguro bw’isezerano bari bashinze ibirenge. 
abaherezabitambo bahetse ubushyinguro baguma muri yorudani rwagati.
kugeza ubwo huzuzwa ibyo uhoraho yari yategetse yozuwe kubwira rubanda byose.
uko musa yari yarabitegetse yozuwe. niko imbaga yihutiye kwambuka.
maze rero rubanda rwose rumaze kwambuka rusingiza uhoraho
ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho hamwe n’abaherezabitambo banyura imbere y’imbaga. 
bene rubeni, bene gadi n’igice kimwe cya kabiri cya bene manase babanziriza aband.i
bitegura intambara, nk’uko musa yari yarabibabwiye.
abantu bageze ku bihumbi mirongo ine, bitwaje intwaro kandi biteguye kurwana, 
banyura imbere y’uhoraho bajya ahagana mu kibaya cya yeriko.
uwo munsi uhoraho yubahiriza yozuwe mu maso y’abayisraheli bose, 
nuko bamutinya batyo nk’uko batinyaga musa mu buzima bwe bwose.
tegeka abaherezabitambo bahetse ubushyinguro bw’isezerano, bazamuke bave muri yorudani.
maze yozuwe ategeka abaherezabitambo barahaguruka
nimuzamuke muve muri yorudani mujye ku nkombe
nuko abaherezabitambo bahetse ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho barazamuka.
bagishinga ibirenge imusozi, ako kanya amazi asubira mu mwanya wayo.
yongera gutemba nka mbere hagati y’inkombe zayo.
imbaga iva kuri yorudani ku wa cumi w’ukwezi kwa mbere
maze icumbika i giligali, mu burasirazuba bwa yeriko.
naho ya mabuye cumi n’abiri bakuye muri yorudani, yozuwe ayashingisha i giligali.
ejo abahungu banyu bazabaza ba se bati ’aya mabuye abibutsa iki?
muzabimenyeshe abahungu banyu muvuga muti ’israheli yambukiye yorudani hano humutse.
uhoraho, imana yanyu, yakamije amazi ya yorudani mubyirebera.
kugeza ubwo mwambutse, nk’uko uhoraho, imana yanyu, yabigize ku mazi y’inyanja y’urufunzo.
ubwo yayakamyaga tubyirebera kugeza ubwo twambutse, 
kugira ngo abantu b’isi yose bamenye ko ikiganza cy’uhoraho ari ikinyabubasha.
kugira ngo kandi iminsi yose mujye mutinya uhoraho, imana yanyu.
abami bose b’abahemori rero bo hakurya ya yorudani mu burengerazuba barabishe
abami bose b’abakanahani bateganye n’inyanja, baza kumenya ko uhoraho yumukije yorudani.
kugeza ubwo bambutse; nuko bacika intege, bananirwa guhumeka imbere y’abayisraheli.
ubajishe ibuye rityaye, maze wongere ugenye abayisraheli. 
yozuwe abajisha ibuye rityaye, nuko agenya abayisraheli ku musozi bahise bita «uw’igenywa.
impamvu yatumye yozuwe abagenya nukugirango amenye ubwoko bwe.
rubanda rwari rwaravuye mu misiri, ab’igitsinagaboni nab’igitsinagore, 
misiri bashiriye mu nzira bakiri mu butayu.
nuko rero, abavuye mu misiri bose bari baragenywe, 
naho abavukiye mu butayu, rubanda rumaze kuva mu misiri, bo nta bwo bari baragenywe.
koko rero, abayisraheli bagenze imyaka mirongo ine mu butayu, 
kugeza ubwo ingabo zose zavuye mu misiri zishira. 
bari baranze kumvira ijambo ry’uhoraho bituma abahana, 
bituma uhoraho abarahirira kutazabereka igihugu yari yarasezeranije
abahungu babo uhoraho yashyize mu mwanya wabo, ni bo yozuwe yagenye
kuko batigeze bagenywa, nta bwo bari babagenyeye mu nzira. 
bamaze rero kugenya imbaga yose, bagumye mu ngando, barindiriye ko bakira.
uyu munsi nabakijije ikimwaro mwavanye mu misiri.
aho hantu bahise giligali kugeza na n’ubu.
pasika ya mbere muri kanahani
abayisraheli baca ingando i giligali, 
maze ku munsi wa cumi n’ine w’ukwezi, nimugoroba, bahimbaza pasika mu kibaya cya yeriko. 
nuko bukeye bwa pasika, barya imbuto zo muri icyo gihugu; 
barya imigati idasembuye n’amahundo yokeje, uwo munsi nyine. 
bukeye bw’umunsi bariyeho imbuto zo mu gihugu, manu ntiyongera kuboneka. 
abayisraheli ntibongera kubona manu, barya ibyeze mu gihugu guhera uwo mwaka.
umugaba w’ingabo z’uhoraho azabanesha ni ngabo ze.
nuko igihe yozuwe yari hafi ya yeriko, yubura amaso aritegereza.
abona umugabo uhagaze imbere ye; yari yakuye inkota mu rwubati ayifashe mu ntoki. 
yozuwe aramwegera, aramubaza ati «uri uwacu, cyangwa se uri uwo mu banzi bacu?
aramusubiza ati «oya, ahubwo ndi umugaba w’ingabo z’uhoraho. 
none ndaje.» nuko yozuwe agwa apfukamye, yubika uruhanga ku butaka.
maze aramubaza ati «databuja arabwira iki umugaragu we?»
umugaba w’ingabo z’uhoraho asubiza yozuwe, ati «vana inkweto mu birenge byawe, 
kuko aha uhagaze ari ahatagatifu.» yozuwe abigenza atyo.
yeriko yari ifunze bikomeye, nta wasohokaga nta n’uwinjiraga,
kubera gutinya abayisraheli n’ingabo zabo. 
uhoraho abwira yozuwe, ati «dore yeriko n’umwami wayo n’abantu bayo bakomeye, ndabibeguriye.
mwebwe rero, ingabo zose ziri ku rugamba, muzazenguruke umugi incuro imwe.
ibyo muzabigire iminsi itandatu.
abaherezabitambo barindwi bazatwara amahembe ya rugeyo, bajye imbere y’ubushyinguro.
umunsi wa karindwi, umugi muzawuzenguruka karindwi.
abaherezabitambo ari ko bavuza ihembe. 
ihembe rya rugeyo nirivuga muzumva ihembe riranguruye ijwi.  
rubanda rwose ruzavuze urwamo rwinshi cyane.
urukuta rw’umugi ruzaherako rwiture hasi.
maze rubanda burire buri muntu aboneje imbere ye.
nimuheke ubushyinguro bw’isezerano, maze abaherezabitambo barindwi batware amahemb.
bajye imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho.» 
ati nimugende muzenguruke umugi.
ariko ingabo ziteguye kurwana zibanze imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho.
byose bigenda uko yozuwe yabibwiye rubanda muzatsinda.
abaherezabitambo barindwi batwaye amahembe arindwi ya rugeyo.
bagenda bayavuza imbere y’uhoraho. 
ubushyinguro bw’isezerano ry’uhoraho bwari bubakurikiye. 
ingabo ziteguye kurwana zari imbere y’abaherezabitambo bavuza ihembe.
ingabo z’inyuma zikurikiye ubushinguro; uko bavuzaga ihembe ni ko bagendaga. 
agira ati «ntimuzasakuze, ijwi ryanyu ntirizumvikane.
kandi ntihazagire n’ijambo na rimwe risohoka mu kanwa kanyu, 
kugeza umunsi nzababwira nti ’muvuze urwamo!’; 
ubwo ni ho muzavuza urwamo nimugera mugico cy’ingabo.
ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho buzenguruka umugi incuro imwe.
hanyuma bagaruka mu ngando baraharara. 
bukeye yozuwe abyuka mu gitondo cya kare.
maze abaherezabitambo baheka ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho. 
abaherezabitambo barindwi batwara amahembe ya rugeyo imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho, 
bongera kugenda bavuza ihembe. 
ingabo ziteguye kurwana zagendaga imbere yabo
naho abandi bakurikira ubushyinguro; bagenda bavuza ihembe. 
kuri uwo munsi wa kabiri, bazenguruka umugi incuro imwe.
hanyuma bagaruka mu ngando. babigenjeje batyo iminsi itandatu.
ku munsi wa karindwi babyuka mu museke.
maze bazenguruka umugi nk’uko bari basanzwe babigenza.
bawuzenguruka incuro ndwi; uwo munsi wonyine ni bwo bazengurutse umugi incuro ndwi.
ku ncuro ya karindwi, abaherezabitambo bavuza ihembe.
nimuvuze urwamo! kuko uhoraho yabeguriye umugi. 
umugi uzarimburwa n’ibiwurimo byegurirwe uhoraho.
rahabu wenyine, ya ndaya, ni we uzarokoka n’abo bazaba bari kumwe mu nzu, 
kuko yahishe intumwa twari twohereje.
naho mwe, mumenye ko nta kigomba gucika ku icumu.
kugira ngo umugi numara kurimbuka, mutazavaho mugira icyo muhakura.
bigatuma ingando ya israheli ihakura umuvumo, ikazavaho igusha ishyano. 
feza yose, zahabu yose, n’ibikozwe mu muringa cyangwa mu butare, ibyo byose bizegurirwa uhoraho, 
maze byinjizwe mu mutungo w’uhoraho.
rubanda ruvuza urwamo maze ihembe riroroma. 
imbaga yumvise umworomo w’ihembe, bavuza urwamo rwinshi.
maze urukuta rw’umugi ruhita rurindimuka ako kanya; 
rubanda bazamuka biroha mu mugi buri wese aboneje imbere ye, maze bigarurira umugi. 
ibyari mu mugi byose barabitsemba, yaba umugabo, cyangwa umusaza.
yozuwe ababarira rahabu ubwo.
yozuwe ashimira ba bagabo babiri batase igihugu
ati nimwinjire mu nzu ya ya ndaya, maze mukuremo uwo mugore n’ibye byose.
ba basore baje gutata binjira kwa rahabu, bamuvanamo, we numuryango we.
bakuramo abo mu muryango we bose
maze babashyira hirya y’ingando ya israheli.
naho umugi bawutwikana n’ibiwurimo byose
batwitse byose keretse feza, zahabu n’ibindi bikozwe mu muringa no mu butare.
maze babyongera ku mutungo w’ingoro y’uhoraho. 
yozuwe akiza atyo rahabu w’indaya, n’umuryango we, n’ibye byose.
kuko yahishe intumwa yozuwe yari yohereje gutata yeriko. 
uwo mugore yabaye mu bayisraheli, n’abamukomokaho bakomeje gutura muri bo kugeza na n’ubu.
agira ati «arabe ikivume imbere y’uhoraho, umuntu wese uzahirahira ngo arubaka uyu mugi wa yeriko.
natangira kuwubaka, umwana we w’imfura azahagwa.
nawushyiraho inzugi arangije, umuhererezi we ahagwe
uhoraho yagumanye na yozuwe, wari umaze kuba ikirangirire mu gihugu cyose.
abayisraheli bakora ikosa ryo kurenga ku muziro.
akani mwene karumi, wa zabudi, wa zerahi wo mu muryango wa yuda, atwara ku byaziririjwe.
maze uburakari bw’uhoraho bugurumanira abayisraheli.
yozuwe ari i yeriko, yohereza abantu i hayi hafi ya betaweni.
arababwira ati «nimuzamuke mutate umugi.
abo bantu barazamuka bajya gutata hayi. 
si ngombwa ko rubanda rwose bazamuka.
abantu ibihumbi bibiri cyangwa bitatu.
nibazamuke batere hayi! wikwirirwa urushya rubanda rwose.
kuko abahatuye ari bake cyane kuri mwe. 
abantu bagera ku bihumbi bitatu muri rubanda barazamuka.
ariko ab’i hayi barabatsimbura kuko bo bari bahageze mbere. 
abantu b’i hayi babicamo nk’abantu bagera kuri mirongo itatu na batandatu.
barabakurikirana kuva ku marembo y’umugi wabo kugera i shebarimu
babatatanyiriza kuri ako gacuri. rubanda ntibaba bagifite umutima; ubutwari bwabo burayoka.
yozuwe n’abakuru ba israheli bashishimura imyambaro yabo.
imitwe yabo bayuzuzamo umukungugu
maze bagwa hasi bubitse uruhanga ku butaka imbere y’ubushyinguro bw’uhoraho.
birirwa batyo kugeza nimugoroba.
yozuwe aravuga ati «yebaba we, nyagasani mana! kuki watumye aba bantu bambuka yorudani?
ese kwari ukugira ngo utugabize abahemori batumare?

abakanahani n’abandi baturage bose b’igihugu bazabyumva.
batugarukane, maze izina ryacu rizimangane mu gihugu.
ubwo se uzakora iki ngo wubahishe izina ryawe ry’ikirangirire?

rwose basahuye ibintu nababujije, barabyiba.

kuko uhoraho, imana ya israheli avuze atya.
hari ikizira kiri muri wowe, israheli.
nta bwo uzashobora guhangana n’abanzi bawe.
kugeza ubwo uzaba wikijije ikizira kikurimo. 
muzakorane ejo mu gitondo, umuryango ukwawo undi ukwawo.

akaba yarakoze ishyano muri israheli.

uburyo bwo gufasha abantu komora ibikomere 
igomba kandi gukora ku buryo abagore batishoboye nk abapfakazi imfubyi n abana batishoboye baba mu ngo zabo
ingwate ugomba gutanga ivugwa mu masezerano 
dufite ijambo ry’ubuhanuzi
afashwe n’urwego rwa dasso kugirango bafatwe
iri hagati ya nyir’ugusaba uruhushya n’uwarutanze
nta kundi wabigeraho utaganiriye na we ntiwazabimenya
iyo abagomba kwishyurwa badashoboye kuyahabwa barasakuza
koko hari imyanzuro nagombaga gufata nkishakira ibisubizo by’ibyo bibazo
igisonga kiribwira kiti ndabigenza nte ko mbona databuja yantereranye‽
nyuma y umunsi umwe batangiye urugendo rwo gusubira imuhira 
amacakubiri irondakoko n’ihezwa ku byiza by’igihugu biragatsindwa
kuri yehova ni nde wamusabira nyamara banga kumvira aribyo byo gukiranuka
igomba guteganya ingorane n’igipimo cy’inyungu
bihuje ku bwabo mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose
yiyandikishe mu bagize urugaga rw’abakora umwuga w’ubuvuzi
umuryango w’abamisiyoneri wavutse bageze mu rwanda
igabanyijwe n’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi butandukanye
umwami agira ibirori abona intoki zandika ku rusika
twahuriye ku nzu y’ubwami kugira ngo badufashe 
ibikenewe mu gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro byihutishwe
ibijyanye n’isoko ry’imari n’imigabane bigengwa na banki nkuru
arimo gufungaho imigozi itwara amazi mu kigega
abagore babiri ba dawidi batari bagifite imbaraga zo kurira bicajwe mu nzu 
ikibazo kigomba kurangirizwa hanze y’imbibi z’u rwanda
ugomaba kwandikisha igihugu ukomokamo cyangwa igihugu wahawemo ubuhungiro
amasezerano yo kwegurira undi icyemezo arasinywa
abagize inama y’ubutegetsi bashobora kweguzwa
ngeze ku marembo y’urupfu  
mu gihe yabonye integuza nibura arabyemera
mu gace ka zone gasonewe nta mahoro yo mu rwanda 
mu myanzuro ifata yanzura ko yemerera igikorwa serivisi bakorana
kugira ngo utange ibisobanuro ugomba gukora iki‽ 
aho kugutera n’umuvumo nka cyo ahubwo uzacyange urunuka 
bwatanze amatungo bukanashyiraho kandi n ingamba zo kuyacunga
arabasubiza ati niba nihesha icyubahiro mumpane
umuhesha w’inkiko w’umwuga wemerewe gukora ni uyu
iz’inteko ishinga amategeko n' iz’inama y abaminisitiri
icyiciro cya mbere ilisiti y’itora
yaravuze ati buri wese aba avuga ibyo yakoze mu mpera
umutwe wa ii  repubulika y’urwanda
umuntu murwanya yaba uworoheje cyangwa ukomeye murwanye umwami wa isirayeli
yahaye ibitangazamakuru n’amashyirahamwe inkunga ingana na miliyoni  
paroisse cathedrale ya gikondo yibutse abayoboke bayo bishwe muri jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
umujyi w’ubuhungiro bwa gatozi n’i gezeri n’ibikingi byaho 
iyo hagiraga umuntu urwara mu muryango wacu twaramusengeraga 
ijanisha ry’imirimo yarangiye mu gihe gito ni mirongo inani ku ijana
ingingo ya munani umutungo watijwe
uko n’abagore b’icyubahiro batari bake babyumva
ubuyobozi bwa kivu watts bwahaye eucl fagitire yishyuza amafaranga y’u rwanda miliyoni icumi
yvanywe ku murimo cyangwa ku mwanya yari afite
bishyirwa mu bikorwa mu izina ry’umuryango
ubwo inzobere mu by’imiti adahari irasubikwa
umugenzuzi bwite mukuru akagenerwa kopi 
ingingo z’aya mategeko uko zivugwa ndazizi
mbese i galeyadi nta muti womora uhaba kuki waje aha‽
umuyobozi mukuru w’urwego rushinzwe imyigire yaje
petero akunda mwanya we kandi ukamugirira impuhwe    
kuva kuri a kugeza kuri z inyuguti ya o izasimbukwa 
izo mfungwa zari zifungiye muri kasho z ubugenzacyaha zigomba koherezwa muri gereza nkuru
uwera wa isirayeli uri hagati yacu
icyo gihe abanzi banjye bazasubizwa inyuma ku bw’imbraga z’imana
mose yabakuye mu gihugu cya egiputa
barazamuka bagandika i kiriyatiyeyarimu y’i galileya
abagabo bo mu mudugudu wabo bamwicishe amabuye
yanduye indwara y’ibimyira ireka gufata amaguru
ariko ushobora kwagurira ibikorwa byawo muri ngoma  
urangwe n’ubutagoma mu isi nka yezu w’i nazareti
yamubajije byose nta kintu yishisha
ariko abiya arushaho gukomera arongora umugore yasabye
wifuza kujya hanze y’u rwanda‽
izina ryawe rihimbazwe uhereye kera kose ukageza iteka ryose
abashinzwe ubuzima n’abakurikirana malariya hafi bavuze ko hari igikwiye gukorwa ngo umubu uyitera  urwanywe
abana bahuje umubyeyi umwe gusa bazungura mu bwumvikane
urwego rw’akarere cyangwa urw’umujyi wa kigali
baduhaye amanota cumi n’atanu ku buryo bukurikira 
imana ishaka ko tubaho iteka ku isi dufite umunezero
hatazagira ubikuramo tugahomba  
ni ugucunga umunsi ku wundi 
abibona kuva aho abisirayeli bagendeye
buri kumba gafite uburebure bungana
barimo n’abashyitsi baturutse mu bihugu duturanye
ubusambanyi bwe yabutojwe na murumuna we w’umuriganya
ku buryo utazi ibyahabereye muri iyi minsi‽
umujyi wa kigali n’abaje bakiriwe
umugabo ati rambura ukuboko kwawe duhoberane
bagaragaje ko ibyakozwe bagiye kubisubizaho
kuva ubo ahindura imibereho ye n’imyitwarire ye
bishobora gukorwa neza kurushaho 
yari umuntu uhora yishimye muri nzeri n’ukwakira  
sinazanywe no guhamagara abakiranutsi ahubwo nazanywe no guhamagara abanyabyaha 
impuzamiryangoremezo ni ihuriro ry imiryangoremezo
cyangwa igiti kibi cyera imbuto nziza ‽
urugero rw’ibibazo urubyiruko rwibaza  
abatuye i kanani bose barejejwe
ugomba gutanga ibisobanuro by’ingirakamaro
kwegura ku bushake binyuze mu mucyo
izashwanyaguza abasore kandi ntibazagirira impuhwe ibibondo ijisho ryabo ntirizababarira abana b’i   babuloni 
areba nibura intara yose cyangwa umujyi wa kigali
bukurikizwa mu rwego rw’ibimenyetso
ikibanza cya nyina umubyara witwa mukamana
amarira atewe ni irimbuka rya siyoni
ku rwego mpuzamahanga na cumi n’ine mu gihugu
abagenzuzi bafite uburenganzira bwite muri za minisiteri 
ubeshya mu kuboko kwe azahanwa kandi ntazihanganirwa
kugira ngo hasigare umubare wa ngombwa musibe kuza
abatware b’abafarisayo ngo basangire baramugenza baramubona
ategetse dayimoni kumuvamo dayimoni yajyaga imuzunguza imuvamo iragenda
batorwa kandi bakemezwa n’inteko rusange 
uburebure bw’igishushanyo cy’umukerubi kimwe
reka dusuzume inkuru eshatu zigaragaza uko bibiliya ishobora kubigufashamo 
umwanya w’umuyobozi w’akarere cyangwa umwungirije iratorerwa
icyakora iyo bibiri bya gatatu batabonetse ntidutora
ingingo ya mbere ubuzima n’mibereho myiza
twifuza ko bose bumva icyo tuvuga
umwana arindwa n’itegeko kuva agisamwa 
abantu batanga serivisi za pansiyo bariyubaha
arasohoka ajya hanze ararira cyane 
hakoreshejwe uburyo ubwo ari bwo bwose 
yavutse ku ngoma ya ahasuwerusi akijya kwima 
ukangisha gukoresha imbaraga ku kibuga 
kuko ikintu abantu babona ko gishoboka kirakorwa
inyandiko ya mbere ibikwa n’umwanditsi 
babana nk’umugabo n’umugore kandi ntacyo bitwaye
iteka rya minisitiri w’intebe rishyiraho abagize inama ngishwanama y’ishami rishinzwe umutungo kamere
uko byagenda kose guhagarika imirimo biragoye
bivugwa mu nama isanzwe n’igihe cyose bibaye
bamaze kugisha inama abayobozi b’igororamuco
koperative dukore nyagatare igamije guteza imbere ububaji no gucuruza ibikomoka ku mpu
ni abahe banditsi b’ibyanditswe bya kigiriki byo muri bibiliya‽
depite rutayisire georgette yadusuye
mu ngingo yayo ya mbere byanditsemo  
uhagarariye isosiyete y’ubucuruzi yafashwe iyo sosiyete yashyizwe mu mwaka ushize
yambara nk’uwataye agakiza ingofero n’imyenda migufi
azaburanira mu rukiko rubifitiye ububasha 
abasinzi bo muri efurayimu baragowe
cyangwa uw’urukiko rw’ubucuruzi
oya rwose luka atamubujije kuva mu rugo yaba amuhemukiye  
mumusige atagera ku rugamba akaduhinduka
none se nzabyara nte kandi ntarigeze mbana n’umugabo‽
abo nkunda bose ndabacyaha kandi nkabahana  
buri gihe najyaga kubwiriza jyenyine kandi sinanirwe
amabwiriza n’amategeko yihariye y’umuryango  
babaga i heburoni mu gihugu cy’i buyuda
nta cyo ndi cyo abisirayeli baranyubaha
ni ugutubura no guhindura imiterere yaho
batorerwa manda y’imyaka itatu ishobora kongerwa
ashinzwe ibijyanye n’ubwirinzi mu byerekeye imiti
ishuri ry’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli ry’i kigali
bakora manda y’imyaka ibiri kandi bashobora kongera gutorwa
umuyobozi w’irangamimerere abisabwe mu karere yabikora
uko biri rwose turayabona ahubwo namwe muzaze dufatanye
hamaze kwishyurwa imyenda yose 
ugomba gukora neza no kugira imyifatire myiza mu kazi
ahabwa urwandiko rw’inzira rw’ingoboka
ingwate yatejwe cyangwa ishobora gutezwa agomba kuba ayizi
yakora ibikorwa yakoraga igihe yahabwaga imfunguzo
ariko umwami waho nsoro bihembe akaba yari yarabitanze ku buntu
abaturage bagaragaje uko babona umutekano rusange icyizere bafitiye ubuyobozi
abashima ubwitange gushyira hamwe abasaba gukomeza urugendo rwiza biyemeje
mariye ati mu gihe cy’imyaka myinshi nagiye ngira ibibazo by’ihungabana incuro nyinshi natekerezaga kwiyahura  
kandi igihugu kitagira amazi nzagihindura amasoko y’amazi
herode na we amushatse aramubura abaza abo bantu icyakorwa
umubitsi acunga umutungo w’umuryango
afite uruhushya rwo gushakashaka amabuye y’agaciro 
nkugiriye inama ukomeze itegeko ry’umwami 
ariko niringiye yuko muzamenya ko twebweho nta kibazo
kubaka igisenge no gusana ahantu birihuta
abantu bane bo mu muryango wanjye bansuye
abaturage bo mu murenge wa bushoki basuwe na depite karisa
iryo joro nasomye ako gatabo mpita nsinzira
nizimara guhitanya zizagaruka zirwana zihindurane igihome
bayidodaho amabara inkingi zayo zibe enye
abakekwaho kugira uruhare muri icyo cyaha bafashwe
ni uko uwo munsi ababenyamini barabatera 
ishyirahamwe kandi ryemera abavugizi baryo 
inama y’abaminisitiri yemeza amatora atanyuze mu nama rusange
koperative umusingi w’iterambere ruli ifite icyicaro i ruli 
iteka rya minisitiri risesa amasezerano y umurimo kuri ba basirikare bakuru n’abasirikare bato 
urwego rusabwa kubahiriza amasezerano 
imiryango itagamije inyungu idufasha mu bukangurambaga
bakomeza gusenga ibigirwamana byabo by’ibiti  
imanza zishyikirizwa ubuyobozi bubifitiye ububasha
afite uruhushya rwo gushakashaka cyangwa gucukura amabuye 
iki gikorwa cyakozwe ntabimenyeshe inzego zibishinzwe
bibiliya ivuga ukuri muri byose
umuhererezi wa yerubuli ararokoka kuko yari yatashye
iyo ibya ngombwa n’ibindi byakoreshejwe biboneka
amasomo ya bibiliya yose avuga imana
ugomba kubaha imana yawe no kugenda mu nzira ikuyoboyemo 
ingingo ya kane gukoza isoni umwe mu bakoze nabi
yehova azi neza ibiguhangayikisha kurusha uko wowe ubizi 
none ngwino unkize amaboko y’umwami wa siriya n’umwami wa isirayeli
ariko ubwo natwe ntituragakoresha nkanswe mwebwe  
ni cyo cyatumaga abayuda bashaka kurenganya abisilaheli
imikono itanu no mu rundi ruhande yindi itanu 
imanza zaciwe ku rwego rw’ubujurire 
yari kumwe n’abo bantu babiri bahagararanye 
babonye bamwe mu babibye inka
bagomba gukurikirana igikorwa cy’amatora 
hagati y’urwego rureberera ilpd n’urwego rwayo
abayobozi b’amashami n’abakozi bari ku rwego rw’akarere
biterwa n’imiterere cyangwa ingano zabyo 
umukushi aramusubiza ati abusalomu ni amahoro  
urukiko rugizwe n’abantu batatu b’inyangamugayo
abazebuluni ni abantu bahaze amagara yabo 
urukiko rw’akarere ka tver rwasheshe
asezeye kubushake cyangwa yirukanywe 
bamaze iminsi y’ubugeni bishimye mu murimo wa yehova
yashyizwe mu micungire y’imari n’abakozi bawo 
icyigisho cy’abapagani kiri mu gatabo k’iteraniro
igihe umuhanuzi yeremiya yaguraga isambu yanditse ko tugomba gushyira ibintu byose mu nyandiko  
ahabwa ahwanye n’icumi ku ijana ry’inyungu
abagize umuryango wa yakobo hanyuma bakaza kubyarana na we          
hanyuma mu kurwanya ruswa leta yashyizeho ibigo byinshi bibikurikirana
inzu ye imaze mu myaka cumi n’itatu 
ni igikorwa giteganyijwe muri iri tegeko kubahiriza agomba 
ariko ibikorwa by’amatsinda ya poritiki anyuranye 
nshobora gutanga ubutumwa bwiza nta kiguzi
bamwe bemera ibyo yavuze ariko abandi ntibabyemere
ingingo ya nyuma ibyo asabwa
akunda guhanga kwerekana no guhuza imirimo
nanone butwigisha kubaho muri iyi si tudatwarwa n’irari ry’iby’isi  
uturere tutari dufite raporo y’uburyo igikorwa cyagenze ubuyobozi burabibazwa
kujya n’abandi impaka bitari ngombwa kubaserereza kubatuka cyangwa guhora ubumvisha ko ibyo bavuga atari byo
byemejwe n’ishyirahamwe bihuje intego  
abandi bafite imbaraga baratozwa
hateranye uturere n’umujyi wa kigali kugirango hafatirwe ingamba zo gukemura icyo kibazo
iyo bane mu bayigize bahari ntawe ubyitaho
irimo no kwohererezanya amafaranga  
imana ni umucamanza utabera irarokora
umutwe wa iii ingingo zinyuranye
b imizabibu ikarishye kandi amenyo y’abana aba yoroshye
azira uburiganya n’ubuhemu mu kizamini cy’akazi  
imbonerahamwe y’uko uturere dukurikirana hakurikijwe intara 
uwahawe uruhushya yaretse ibikorwa bisebanya
kuko inyenyeri imwe itanganya ubwiza n’izindi 
ibyerekana ibyo uvuga afashe yerekana cyangwa ibyo agiye kuvuga
bahungishije abamisiyonari abakozi ba beteli b’abanyamahanga n’abubatsi mpuzamahanga babajyana i konakri 
ubwoko bw’ibintu byinjira mu rwanda byarahagaze
abashinzwe ibigo n’abashefu ni abayobozi b’amashami  
kugira ngo ashobore gutanga ikirego cye atange kopi hose
manase na murumuna we bamaze guhabwa gakondo zabo 
mu miryango yabo biteguye kubana neza n’abo bazasangayo  
mu rwobo rwabo haguyemo udusimba twinshi
ya vatiri yavuye ku isoko yaguzwe 
ni icyemezo cy’urukiko rwajuririwe gitangiriyeho 
ashinzwe umurimo n’’imikoranire mu miyoborere ya buri munsi 
ibi binyuranye n’ibiteganywa n’iri tegeko  
kkandi iryo menyesha rigira agaciro guhera ku munsi ritangiweho
ibyo kutubahiriza iri tegeko birahanirwa
kandi bazamenya ko ndi umuhanga
ibigo by’imari biciriritse byemerewe bishobora amafaranga yabo
umuhuza cyangwa utanga serivisi yo gutanga akazi 
atumiwe mu nama y’inteko rusange
maze hagakorwa ikiganiro mu umurenge wabo
asabwa ibimenyetso bigaragaza uburenganzira yavukijwe
bafite yo guteza imbere ubuzima
ndashaka amafaranga yo kugura imodoka senkuro 
guhembera uburakari ni bibi cyane
rura kandi igakurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryabyo
na we aramubwira ati dusobanurire neza uwo mugani     
umwami yemera ubwami bw’imana
yaba adahari cyangwa se adashobora kuhaboneka
asaba ingwate iyo ariyo yose ku mutungo utimukanwa 
abarebwa n’icyo kibazo ntibagomba kugira uruhare mu igurisha
biterwa n’igwa ry’imvura ritangana
mu kwezi kwa mbere ku munsi wako wa cumi tuzabonana
byanatewe n’urwango mwari mubafitiye  
iyi nzu isanzwe ibamo abantu cyangwa murabeshya‽
shekeli imwe izahwane n’amadorali ijana
amafoto cyangwa videwo bivuga iby’ibitsina mu buryo bweruye ntizerekwa abana
byatewe no kwica amabwiriza cyangwa ubundi buteshuke
akazishyikiriza inteko rusange kugira ngo ibyemeze 
abatangabuhamya bahamagazwa binyujijwe mu nyandiko
muzarwana nk’ingabo ariko muzashoboza kuzimisha imyambi
abantu babona agakiza ku bw’urukundo rw’imana
mu gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda zo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina hateguwe amahugurwa atamdukanye
hakiriwe uwizeyimana yagiriwe inama yo kwandikira akarere ka nyarugenge
nebukadinezari yaravuze ati imana ya shadaraki meshaki na bedenego iba he
zigomba kwishyira hamwe kugira ngo zishyireho amabwiriza  
hakenewe icyemezo cy’umutungo cyangwa indi nyandiko
yehowahazio yimye ingoma afite imyaka makumyabiri
uruhare rw’u rwanda mu muryango wa afurika yunze ubumwe  
umuyobozi w’ibiro bya segiteri cyabakamyi na we baramujyana bigeze nijoro baramwica 
bumeze nk’ubw’ikizu kituzuye
inyandiko y’ipiganwa igomba kwakirwa bitarenze uyu munsi
nkurikije uko yafatwaga bagirango agweyo  
kurushaho gukurikirana abakoze ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina no guca burundu umuco wo kutabahana babakatire 
yehova abona isuku yehova yashyizeho gahunda
ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko intara y amajyaruguru yera kurusha iy’amajyepfo
ibintu bishyushye ni ibizira mu menyo  
azaba asigaye arokotse mu be wenyine
mu itora iryo ari ryo ryose ukoresha ibiranga umuntu
uko birata ku bw’imibiri yanyu ntibinshimisha na gato
maze ntibite ku uwera wa isirayeli kandi ariwe ubabeshejeho
ibiteganywa n’itegeko rigenga imitunganyirize y’umujyi
hananiya maze afata umuhanuzi yeremiya ati nkurikira
gukemura inzitizi zavuka biturutse ku makimbirane
bagomba kuzamura imari shingiro yabo mu gihe gito
mubikore bitarenze iminsi ine nyuma y’iyo minsi harafungwa  
umuryango wo muri kongo wamwakiriye maze nyuma yaho arapfa
yitaye ku ikurikirana ry’igihombo kandi ubusabe bwo bwakiriwe
abo mu buyuda bose bishimira iyo ndahiro
guhabwa abantu cyangwa amatsinda ni uburenganzira
iyo bibiraga babaga ari ugusoma
rukazamuka ruva i yeriko rukanyura mu gihugu cyacu
amafaranga y’igenzuramikorere yishyurwa n’akarere
baza mu nama y’itorero batizigamye  
ababura basimburwa n’ababwirizabutumwa 
yari yarohereje abamisiyonari mu rwanda
ubushishozi bwo kugena niba bwabuze birazamba

umugenzuzi yari kuza ku munsi wa munani
aje gufasha abantu bari bafite inyota y’ukuri mu mugi wa yeriko
iyo imari shingiro yiyongera bivuga ko bunguka
hanagenzurwa imiryango mu rwego rwo gusuzuma niba imikorere yayo yubahiriza amategeko
nari mfite inyota ntimwampa icyo kunywa 
itegeko ryerekeye umutekano w’abantu n’ibintu
yarafashwe afungirwa muri gereza ya butare 
kureka urubanza rwaciwe bishobora gukorwa rugasubirwamo
byari kuba byiza iyo usubiza uti simpari
maze amenye ijwi rya petero ibyishimo bimubuza gukingura ahubwo yirukankira mu nzu ajya kumenyesha abandi
abagore basezeranye nabo ndetse no kubafasha mu bibatunga  
bwana gashayija nathan agizwe umuyobozi mushya
imyifatire n’imyitwarire mu itorero irihariye
gusa umbere urwane intambara za yehova 
umutwe wa iv ingingo zinyuranye 
simfite kujijuka nk’umuntu ariko abandi bose birashoboka
akarere ka kamonyi intara y’amajyepfo 
ibyishyuwe byose cyangwa bimwe muri byo nabitwaye
ibiro byose byakurikiye amatora uretse umukandida wigenga nsengiyumva janvier wajuririye komisiyo y’igihugu
hashingiwe ku mpamvu zumvikana aratah
uwo mutware w’inzu y’imbohe nta kintu na kimwe yari agicunga muri gereza
mu gihe uguye ku mafoto abyutsa irari ry’ibitsina irengagize
nzakuvura inguma zawe ni ko uwiteka avuga  kuko bari barakwibasiye
ariko muri mwe si ko biri ahubwo ushaka kuba mukuru abe ariwe muto cyane
nyirubwite yahawe ubushobozi bwo kuzungura
itorero ry’abisirayeli ryose i kadeshi mu butayu bwa parani 
ukitondera amategeko n’amateka yanjye 
yariyamiriye ati mbega ukuntu ndi uwo kubabarirwa 
abayoboke b’amadini babona ibyo kurya biyushye akuya
iyo igitambo cyabaga gifite inenge cyaratwikwaga
umubare w’abagize inama y’ubutegetsi ni babiri

imana ari yo yaremye ibintu byose irakuzi
amaze imyaka magana atatu na mirongo itandatu n’itanu 
mukarugwiza umubikira w’umwizeramariya w’umunyarwandakazi
bihezuraga imbiribiri ayandi mezi atandatu bakaba bararangije
umuntu wese ukoze ikosa ryo kukuvutsa uburenganzira bwawe aba yishe ayo mabwiriza
nuko akishi ahamagara dawidi aramubwira ati ngwino hano
uhereye mbere na mbere ku isoko y’amazi 
yihitiyemo ingingo ya kane y’iri tegeko iteganya ko abakozi bagomba gukora sendika no kujya mu mpuzamasendika 
icyiciro cya cyenda guteza urusaku no gusinda
abagenerwa bikorwa b’ibikorwa by’umuryango batumiwe
keretse igihe bisabwa mu itegeko
nuko yesu ahura na bo arababwira ati nimugire amahoro baramwegera bamukora
imana yaremye ijuru n’isi
ingingo ya munani uburyo uruhushya rutangwa
inama y’abagenzuzi b’imbere mu kugabanya ibihombo
bikorwa n’ayishyurwa mu gihembwe cyangwa mu mwaka
iyo umara amasaha menshi kandi ugakoresha imbaraga nyinshi muri ako kazi ukora urananirwa
inama iyobowe na perezida wayo mu muhezo
inzego z’imirimo za leta zateranye  
manda yabo imara imyaka itanu ishobora kongerwa 
igika cya mbere cy’iyi ngingo bagomba kureka kigasuzumwa neza
n’ay ‘urugendo akomatanyije ahabwa ugize biro
gushingira ku mpamvu zongera cyangwa zikaza igihano si byo
gutegura no kuyobora amahugurwa y’inteko rusange
byarakosowe abakozi bari ku rwego rumwe
impuzandengo y’ukwezi ku mukozi ufite uburambe bw’imyaka icumi
jya wizeza abantu bihebye ko abavandimwe na bashiki babo ari umuntu wese
raporo za buri gihembwe n’iza buri mwaka zirakenewe
ubunyage bwari kuzamara imyaka mirongo itanu  
l hommeko igihe muzemera ko inzoka yicwa muzakira
ajya imbere y’imikumbi y’ihene baragenda
iby ‘bucuruzi kandi zicunga igitabo cy’umutungo
ingingo ya gatanu gushima abacungagereza
abona mirongo itanu by inyungu mbumbe cyangwa akarenzaho
inyungu ingana na miliyoni enye z’amadolari
bizakugwana n’uruhumbu kandi bizagukurikirana kugeza bikurimbuye 
agiye guha nshimiyimana joseph ishimwe rijyanye n’ubwitange
yatakaje ubushobozi bwo gutekereza     
ingingo ya munani inama y’ubuyobozi ya rnra
iteka rya minisitiri rishyiraho ububasha n’inshingano by’abagenzuzi b’imiti n’ifumbire
icyatumye avuga ati ntimuboneye mwese ni uko tutejejwe twese  
bikamuviramo kwirukanwa mu rwanda
cyangwa byinshi mu bigo bifite ubwiganze bw’abagabo
ingingo ya cyenda igihano giteganyirizwa abibye
maze babwira iteraniro ryose ry’abisirayeli bati igihugu cyacu cyanyazwe
birinda amarangamutima hubahirizwa ibikubiyemo byose
n’ab’i yerusalemu mwabagurishije abagiriki kugira ngo bajyanwe kure y’igihugu cyabo  
ibintu bigikorwa bihabwa agaciro hakurikijwe umusaruro bitanga
abambari ba jambo twiyemeza kumukorera
gushinga amashuri y’incuke abanza n’ayisumbuye birahenda
kandi sinimye amaso yanjye icyo yifuza cyose 
imfura z’abahungu bawe uzazimpe
ntibazongera kuba amahanga abiri
hashingiwe ku musaruro wabonetse harera rwose
inkoni zabo z’ubutware zanyazwe
ibisanzwe byemezwa ku bwiganze bw’amajwi
imyaka yibasirwa n’inkubi z’imiyaga y’umuhindo 
imbere ya yehova ku bw’icyaha yakoze azababarirwa icyaha cye  
ese niba rutangirira muri twe kuki tutabikora‽
ibyabuze bibarirwe mu mari shingiro bwite
ku bw’iyo ngingo ni na byo bihabwa umuntu wese wibye
lusitira iwabo wa timoteyo 
imirima y’imyelayo ireze neza
hakwiye ingando kwirinda kugirwa ibikoresho byakwirakwiza ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside
wandike itariki imirimo yakiriweho burundu 
icyakora mu gihe kwegukana umutungo bitabayeho uzigarukire
umutwe wa vi ingingo zisoza
bafite itsinda ry’abakozi ba leta bayobora
kandi abari bafite amabuye y’igiciro cyinshi bakiriwe neza
umutungo bwite mu madovize abitse agomba gukoreshwa
igitero cy’amahanga kirwana na leta y’u rwanda
izo nterahamwe zari zambaye imyenda yera n’amababi y ibiti ku mutwe
nagukorera iki mwana wanjye‽       
uwitegereza umuyaga ntazabiba kandi uwitegereza ibicu azakora
nimwigire hino twegere imana y’ukuri sawuli abaza imana ati ese manuke
itegeko rigena inshingano imitunganyirize n’imikorere bya komisiyo y’igihugu ishinzwe ibiza
amasosiyete yose yafatanijwe hagasigara isosiyete izihuza 
mushiki wacu yakomeje kutugemurira igihe cyose byabaga bishoboka hari igihe numvaga kwihangana bigiye kunanira
kuko ntabwo abakene bazashira mu gihugu 
yerekeranye n’inguzanyo ingana na miliyoni cumi
igice cya cyenda guhitamo abanyamuryango
amaso ya yehova ari kuri twe
uko ibyemezo bishyirwa mu bikorwa 
yemeye gukurikiza amategeko rusange hamwe n’imyanzuro yose
none kandi uhawe igikingi yiyemeje kwemera igihombo
babirimburiye byose abisirayeli bose baherako baragenda

afite inyungu y’ibihumbi magana atanu y’u rwanda
ukomeza kubihabwa kugeza igihe kigenwe n’amategeko
banki nkuru ishyiraho amabwiriza
impamyabumenyi yemejwe n’inzego zibifitiye
twize amateka y’imibanire y’abanyarwanda 
igenewe guturwamo n’imiryango itishoboye
itegeko ry’igenamigambi kugira ngo bakore ibiteganywa

amaze kumva inama zihagije z’umuhanga yemeye kunywa imiti
agomba kuvugurura amabwiriza agenga uruhushya rwe
ni uko pawulo arazamuka afata ibyo kurya atangira kurya

aho hantu kuko yesu yajyaga ahahurira n’abigishwa be yarahicaye

banki ihamagarira rubanda kugura imigabane 
ubufatanye bugamije guteza imbere itangazamakuru
babuloni uwo mwami yategetse itegeko yuko bahunga
itsinda ku rwego rw’akarere rigizwe n’aba bakurikira

ababaga bari mu isoko barabyumvaga
njye kukwereka urubanza yari yaciye‽
namara kugwiza imbaraga ku bw’ubutunzi bwe azishima
ishami ry’intumwa ry’ububyutse mu rwanda
imbonerahamwe ya mbare imbonerahamwe y’imirimo yemerera komisiyo y’abakozi

yehova kuki utureka tugatandukira inzira zawe kuki ureka dusubira mu bihe bya kera    
maze umwami arahaguruka yicara ku karubanda 
ifitiye igihugu akamaro k’iminsi cumi n’itanu 
uburyo busanzwe bw’imitangire y’amasoko   
akunda guha uguza umwe inguzanyo irenze  
bitwa izina rya isirayeli bagakomoka mu mazi ya yuda 
umurimo w’isoresha uvugwa muri icyo cyemezo watanzwe na we
ni cyo gituma bazarya ibiva mu ngeso zabo 
mu mabwiriza asanzwe ni uburyo bashobora gusobanurira ababyeyi n’imiryango yabo
umwami mwiza w’amahoro ni yezu
agena akarere ibiro by’ivunjisha bikoreramo 
urukiko rutangaza inyandiko igaragaza amahoro
kuba abanditse bibiliya barayoborwaga n’umwuka w’imana
ikibaya gito cy’amazi gicitsemo igice

babivuga hose uhereye i galilaya kugera i buyuda
ntaho agihuriye na we haba ku giti cye cyangwa bari kumwe
ariko kenshi bakaganira atamwitayeho   
niba ushaka gutera inkunga jya ubishyira mu bikorwa
imikorere yabo ibangamiye abaturage igihe bamara mu mpapuroooo

intego z’umuryango zigerweho

icyumweru cya kane n’abanyeshuri barasurwa 
nuko mubwire nyir’inzu muti umwigisha aje kurara iwawe
nkunda kuburanishwa n’urukiko rw’ikirenga kimwe kurugana
iri tegeko rishyirwaho umokono n’abagize sinode bose
abagaragaza ko mu turere bakoramo babona ari nta ngamba zo gukumira ivangura zifatwa
birakwiriye ko umugore asenga imana adatwikiriye gusuzugura
nta gucururiza mu mahanga keretse iyo hariho ubwumvikane
yambitse ubusa uwo basangiye amaraso  
bazaryozwe icyaha cyabo kuko umuntu uzaryamana n’umugore wa se ari amahano
uko urushaho kwigana yehova ni ko abandi bazarushaho kwifuza kukubera abahamya
ibyo ni byiza ariko uzajye ubikora mu bugwaneza 
muri ayo mezi habaye igeragezwa ry’iyo serivisi  
byasinywe cyangwa byashyizwe mu nyandiko na komite yose
akunda ubucuruzi bwo kwisanzura  
yamwishyuye ibihumbi bitatu na magana atandatu na mirongo itatu 
amategeko akubiyemo ubushake bw’ ibyaremwe byose
icyakora igiteranyo cy’ibiro byose by’umubiri we bikagera kuri ku ijana  
ayobora diyosezi gatolika ya byumba    
igihe kirekire wubahwa n’abakuze
bakunda umurimo wo kubwiriza  bakaba barihanganiye ibibazo
bashinzwe gusesa imanza bagendeye ku biteganywa n’itegeko 
kugira ngo agaragaze ko kwiringira ibigirwamana ari bibi
aherutse kubyemererwa na banki nkuru 
nkwandikiye niringiye ko uzanyumvira nzi yuko unkunda
abatowe bagomba kubanza kwemezwa na konseye jenerali
imirongo ngenderwaho ku masoko manini ni iyi ikurikira
kugirango bose babashe kuzimenya no kuzitabira igihe bazikeneye 
ibyaremwe byose ni ibyawe kuko ibintu byose ari ibyo mu ijuru cyangwa ku isi ni iby’imana
irindi somo twavana muri uru rugendo tumazemo iminsi ni uko ibyo dukora twabishyiraho umutima
tugomba kugena agaciro k’ibintu bigoranye 
urakivuga kugira ngo kizakurikiranwe ariko ntabyo nari nzi

uretse ku byerekeye ibirego byihutirwa nibyo tumusaba
agaruka asingiza imana mu ijwi riranguruye
intumwa za yakobo zimubwira yuko esawu aza kuza
aza mu gihugu cy’abakaludaya arivugisha umuhanuzi yeremiya

iyo ubwibone buje gukorwa n’isoni na byo biraza ariko ubwenge bufitwe n’abiyoroshya  
bakora ibikorwa bikabije by’ubugizi bwa nabi
twirirwa tugoka izuba ritumena agahanga ariko asubiza umwe ati mwihamgane
kimanukira ku misozi y’i siyoni kuko aho ari ho hari agakiza
izina rye ryihesheje icyubahiro cyaryo ryishyiriraho n’ubutabera
umwami akuramo impeta ye ayirambika hasi
bagera ku ruzi rwa gozani no mu migi ya babiloni
urwego rw’umurenge rugizwe n’abanyamuryango icyenda
bikorwa ku rwego rwa mbere rutaziguye no ku rwego rwa gatatu ruziguye 
bana mwumvire ababyeyi banyu
igihe cy’ishyirwa mu bikorwa kirageze
akuriye n’ubuyobozi n’umutekano mu kagari

itegeko ngenga ritangazwa mu igazeti ya leta

abayobozi b’amadini bangaga abahamya ba yehova kandi babuzaga abayoboke

mu giheburayo ni imunsi y’izuba ahantu hamwe    
ni ukwishyura nyuma yo gutanga sheki 
iyo umukiriya uri ku muyoboro mubazi y’amazi irikaraga

ni ko nahawe amezi anguye nabi ho ibihembo

yakorewe i kigali ku murenge wa gisozi

ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko igipimo cy’iterambere ry’itangazamakuru mu rwanda 
umwanzuro wo kwemererwa nk’umunyamuryango
abwira uwo mugore ati jya wubaha abashyitsi
vuba aha isengesho rya fredy ryarashubijwe  
hari abahamya bakoze urugendo rugoye bagana muri uwo mudugudu
uwa mbere amwita yemima
amategeko n’amabwiriza bigaragazwa muri raporo
bari mu rugo rwa se abana babo bato n’imikumbi yabo
nta we ukuvuganira
cyangwa gukosora umwanzuro w’abunzi
buri kwezi bizajya byera imbuto
maze abantu bose bagera mu ishyamba hari saa sita z’ijoro
hanyuma babashyira abacamanza
ati niba ari uko bimeze nimufate ibintu byiza byo muri iyo nzu
nenda ako gatabo ngakura mu ntoki zaho
yemerewe kujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru 
mu gihe abayobozi bazo basanze byatuma babagaya
cyangwa kuririmba mu ruhame
umuyobozi wa kie ni we uyobora kandi ur
ufatanya n’abazima bose aba agifite ibyiringiro 
iyo igihe cy’igeragezwa kirangiye umwarimu arangajwa
namwe muhore mwiteguye kuko umwana w’umuntu ari hafi
umurimo no kwimenyereza akazi mu kigo
hakozwe ubukangurambaga no kubihugurira abakozi b’inzego za leta n’izigenga  
igenzura ry’imikorere y’inzego za leta igenzura inyigo ku miterere ya ruswa mu nzego zitandukanye  
igihe nzavuga iby’ishyanga n’iby’igihugu 
nntiyagira icyo yireguza na hato 
amaze kujya inama na komite nyobozi
ahubwo mugakurikiza amategeko y’amahanga abakikije    
ingingo ya munani kujuririra minisitiri
cyangwa mu bindi bikorwa bigomba gusinywa
ati subira mu gihugu cyanyu
kigashyikirizwa urukiko rubufitiye ububasha 
ni uko ku munsi uheruka w’iyo minsi mikuru barahura
bikorwa n’undi bikozwe ku buryo bw’uhamagara
umupayiniya wa bwite witwa hla aung yagotewe hagati y’imirwano y’ingabo za leta n’abazigometseho 
ni icyiciro cya ruvumbu wo ku kibuye 
byavuye mu nshingano zacyo n’umuyobozi ufite ububasha
iyo uruhushya rwasabwe rwerekeye uburwayi ruremerwa 
byitiriwe u rwanda nk’uko bigaragara mu ngingo ya gatanu  
nk’uko yemejwe n’iteka rya perezida wa repubulika
marangara yacungaga imirima ya kibogo kandi yamuherekeje kuyisura
gukomatanyiriza hamwe ibice birigize
ni amafaranga atangwa ku ruhushya rwanditse
afitanye isano iyo ariyo yose n’ubujurire
namwe muzaba abagaragu bacu
ashinzwe kugeza ubuvuzi kuri bose kandi ku buryo bumwe
igisigo mu buke bwitwa ubusizi 
wagenwe na guverinoma y’u rwanda
inama y’ubutegetsi igomba gukora ku buryo bikorwa
icyemezo cy’ifatiratambama ntigishobora
ibyo bintu ukora biguhire
ntibazongera kwambara imyambaro y’ubwoya 
tera se w’aburahamu akaba na se wa nahori
ishusho y’uko abaturage babona imikorere ya njyanama   
kimwe mu byo yashoboye kubona kizabe igitambo gitambirwa uwiteka
bbagiye mu butumwa imbere mu gihugu bakoresheje imodoka
nyuma mubandikiye muyisaba  
abagize inama ngishwanama bahuye
abayobozi bakuru babazwa ibyerekeye abakozi bose
ishyirahamwe rya ba nyir’umutungo 
abagize inteko rusange icyo gihe bitoramo uyiyobora
ngo imaremo umuntu ubwibone bwe buhishwe 
ndababwira yuko muzabona ijuru rikingutse 
ubuhamya bwagenwa n’urukiko nka kimwe mu bisabwa
iyaba aburahamu yaratsindishirijwe n’imirimo aba yarakiriwe
indwara y’umwijima wa hepatite b na hepatite c mu turere twose tw’u rwanda barayipima
abasiriya bahageze bamenye aho bari bari
icyo gihe hamaze kwishyurwa imyenda yose
aka karere kagerwamo n’indwara mu gihe kizwi 
ishyirwaho ry’abashinzwe kurangiza iseswa ry’umutungo
usobanuze imana ko tuzahirwa mu rugendo rwacu
kumwe n’abigishwa be benshi n’abantu benshi
yari azi neza ko iyo nshingano izabazwa isosiyete 
igihe izindi ebyiri zisigaye zamanutse 
haririmbwa igitero cya mbere n’icya nyuma by’iyo ndirimbo
cyangwa rw’inguma ari iby’abantu baburaniye mu rukiko
uretse mu manza z’inshinjabyaha 
amande ya buri mwaka ahwanye na miliyoni eshanu
gukomeza kwigisha cyane cyane ababyiruka mu rwego rwo kubongerera
angana na miliyoni by’abanyamuryango nyakuri 
ni igihombo cyikururiwe na we
k’uwayikoze cyangwa abayikoranye ko izo zemewe
uburyo aya mategeko azubahirizwa kimwe 
intwaro zuzuye z’umukristo zivugwa mu befeso   
gusobanukirwa n’uko abanyarwanda babanaga mbere y’abazungu
n’amabwiriza ya komisiyo y’igihugu y’amatora 
bidashobotse hagakurikizwa ubwiganze bw’amajwi
ibice byubatswemo mu mujyi bishobora kuba byaruzuye
uwarusabye yujuje ibisabwa hakurikijwe uburyo busabwa
bamaze iminsi mirongo itatu baririra aburahamu
numva nari nkwiriye kubona amanota menshi
hana umwana wawe nibwo azavamo umugabo
nuko yehova imana yawe nakujyana mu gihugu yarahiye ba sokuruza aburahamu 
buri myaka itatu inama rusange yitoramo abantu bayihagarariye
rugahabwa amafaranga binyuze mu mfashanyo
ngo ahabwe ijambo mu rwego rwo kumwubaha
icyiciro cya mbere ibyaha bibangamira ikigo
indonke yaba imugenewe cyangwa yaba iy’abandi
naho ku isoko abanenga bagera kuri bane
isuku ntimeze neza hakwiye kongerwa umukwabu
bimwe by’ishyirahamwe impano imirage n’ubundi buryo
nta gikorwa cyangwa kutamenyekanisha iyo nkuru
iteka rya minisitiri w’intebe ryemerera umukozi wo ku rwego rw’ubuyobozi muri minisiteri
igarama ritanzwe n’ugura akimara kugura
ingingo ya mbere ishyirwaho ry’ukurikirana imanza
akora mu bijyanye n’abakozi tekiniki imari n’ubukungu
nta zina rishobora gukoreshwa nk’izina imana
yaramushubije ati nta cyo ahubwo nkorera yehova 
imbonezamikurire y’abana bato hibandwa ku kurwanya imirire mibi 
ni perezida wa komite ushinzwe gutoresha
kwandikisha isosiyete y’inyamahanga 
ivugwa mu gace ka mbere k’igika cya mbere cy’iyi nyandiko
hari n’amafoto ku rwibutso rwa jenoside rwa kigali nyanza kicukiro na nyamata
gushyiraho amabwiriza kuri ibi bikurikira 
ashobora gutoranywa mu bajya mu mahanga
gutanga ikibazo bikorwa mu ibaruwa 
satani n’abayoboke be bakora uko bashoboye kugira ngo bahagarike umurimo w’imana
hasabwe ko igikorwa gishyikirizwa inama rusange
ibyabaye muri icyo gihugu n’indwara uwiteka yarabikijijej
bibumbiye muri cotraf bakorera muri gahunda
guteza imbere umuco nyarwanda biciye muri nyigisho
umuntu areka kuba umunyamuryango iyo asezeye 
kwita ku gucunga neza umutungo
dufate ayo masezerano nimucyo twiyezeho umwanda
ku bushake yandikira perezida wa komite nyobozi 
umunyamahanga utari uwa leta uteganya guhagarika uwo mukozi
umuntu wese wo mu rugo arakenewe
igitabo cy’u rwanda nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe
ni inyandiko zinyuranye zirimo inyandiko yishyuriweho abakozi  
ushyire ayo mabuye yombi kuri ya mishumi ya ruguru
inama ngenzuzi y’umutungo igizwe n’abantu batatu
umubyeyi umaze kubyara hamwe no mu gihe cyose yonsa agomba gukoresha n’umuti wa niverapine 
ndetse rubizeza ubufatanye ku bibazo babonamo imbogamizi cyangwa babona ko batashobora
bitabangamiye ibihano biteganywa n’andi mategeko
ugasanga ubuzima buramunaniye agata ishuri cyangwa agashaka guta umuryango
ucisha intoki zawe amahundo‽
naje gusaba ubufasha bwo gushaka akazi 
tugize amahirwe aya mategeko shingiro akemerwa n’inteko
kamana utuye kamazuru gahogo nyamabuye i muhanga mu ntara y’amajyepfo
bazane amazi bayakwirakwize ku bo agenewe batuye muri ako gace
ibikorwa bijyanye no kubungabunga ibimenyetso bya jenoside    
wibuka umubarenkubishwa wo kubara imisoro‽ 
basubira mu midugudu yabo umuntu wese ajya mu bye
ariko impumyi iyo irandase indi zombi zahumye ubibona ute‽
ni ukuvuga impinduka bazanye n’ukuntu bisa n’ibyaboroheye 
hari ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko mu bice bimwe na bimwe ari ibinyoma  
iyo utarashaka hari igihe ushobora kwibaza uko bashyingiranywe  
uku ni ko uwiteka avuga ati havumwe umuntu utuka imana
ayobora inteko rusange n’inama y’ubutegetsi 
ishobora kwifashisha inzobere mu gukemura amakimbirane
muzawurindirize umunsi wa cumi n’ine w’ukuva ku rupfu
gusobanukirwa n’amategeko ahana icyaha cya jenoside 
aya ni amagambo bavuze igihe urufatiro rw’inzu ya yehova nyir’ingabo rwashyirwagaho
ishusho y’uko abaturage babona imikorere ya njyanama 
iyo giteguwe mu cyongereza cyangwa mu gifaransa arabokora
aya mabido ni ay’abakoresha amazi  
guverinoma igizwe na minisitiri w’intebe abaminisitiri n’abaminisitiri
ni inyigisho nziza zo muri bibiliya uzumve yesaya  
inzego z’umuryango ni inteko rusange na komite nyobozi
byemewe n‘amategeko akurikizwa mu bitabo byabo
ni yo mpamvu itangwa muri urwo rwego  
ndahiye yehova imana nzima ko ntabazi
ibiro by’ubucuruzi bya banki 
natamuha ibimugomba nk’abashakanye yisubirireyo   
jya uteganya ubigiranye ubwitonzi
amara amezi atandatu imikorere ye idahwitse
kuba mu mezi abiri gusa ashize hari abahuye n’ibiza ni ukubyitondera
kubaza ibyo abaturage bakenera mu rukiko 
ni we jisho ry’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ni we mucungamutungo 
mu rwego rwo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga gusura inzibutso za jenoside
iryo shuri riri mu bwoko bwa kaminuza 
byavanzwe n’ibindi ku buryo imiterere yabyo itagaragara
umuvumvu wese agomba gusukura uburoso bwe
urwo rubuga rubonekaho ibintu byinshi amagazeti imikino n’ibindi
ni iki abahamya ba yehova bahuriyeho n’abandi bantu ‽
abikora mu gihe badashoboye kuboneka 
iyo ari ngombwa ko umuntu runaka aba akiriho
kandi abanzi bawe bose uko bangana bazajyanwa mu muriro
bangana nk’umusenyi wo ku nyanja  
ibibazo byavuka ku birebana n’ bucuruzi twabikemura 
ibirenge bya yesu abihanaguza umusatsi we amusigaho n’amavuta impumuro y’ayo mavuta ahumura neza itama hose
raporo iri mu gitabo igaragaza ko zari inyandiko mpimbano 
kandi abimukira bazifatanya na bo ubwabo
ugomba kwishyura mu rwego rwo kwemera amakosa
ibyo twakoze byatweretse ko abantu bafite ubushobozi bwo gukora ibyiza bakubaka igihugu gishya 
mu gihe uwo mwana atarabonerwa umuryango ba umufashe 
yehova abona ate umurimo w’umukiranutsi‽
inshuti z’umuryango bashinzwe abana batagira kivurira
ingingo ya mbere gukoresha igihangano 
amasezerano ashingiweho uko kwifashisha yarakozwe
bitewe n’abigisha b’ibinyoma bibiliya igira iti bazatukisha inzira y’ukuri     
nzateza umwijima muri rubanda n’amazi menshi areke gutemba  
ni n’uburyo bwiza bwo kuganira na so wo mu ijuru
kandi se wakora iki kugira ngo wirinde kurengera mu gihe bakwiyenzaho
kugira uruhare rugaragara mu bikorwa by’urukundo
nari se w’abakene i nyarurembo
bisaba gutangirwa uruhushya n’ikigo ngenzuramikorere

ayajyanye ku buyobozi bw’umurenge

afite uburenganzira bwo kudahanirwa iri kosa

umutwe wa mbere amafaranga asabwa
gadi b abwira dawidi ati ntukomeze kuba mu misozi

umutekano w’amakuru yanjye urizewe

ahanishwa igihano cy’igifungo kuva ku myaka ibiri kugera kuri irindwi

atanga kandidatire ku mwanya w’ubudepite
yubaha amabwiriza rusange ku buryo bukomeye
muhe ishimwe wamugeneye kuko yagiriye ineza ikomeye

abakoresha bashyiraho komite ishinzwe ubugenzuzi
kandi arindishwe n’ubuturo bwera bwose n’ibiburimo

ntashobora guhabwa ibigenerwa abacyuye igihe kuko yitwaye nabi
afite ububasha n’inshingano zikurikira 
ubusobekerane bugaragariye mu iburanisha 
umutwe wa ii irimbi ry’abayobozi 
ihame shingiro rya repubulika y’u rwanda
bita ku bikorwa by’umuryango ndetse bakanabikorera raporo 
yirukanwa nta nteguza kandi agasabwa guhita yishyura amande
nzaziragira mu rwuri rwiza kandi ikiraro cyazo ngoihore hafi
impamvu zo kwanga zigomba kuvugwa muri iyo raporo
dukoresha ibikorerwa mu rwanda n’ibitumizwa mu mahanga mu rwego rwo kuzamura ubukungu
bigaragara ku mugereka w’iri teka 
abakire bo muri iyi si ya none bararenze
ibyerekeye abakozi bo mu buyobozi bwite bwa leta bizakosorwa

dufatanye umurimo karani ngufu mageragere

raporo itangwa kugira ngo bayifashishe mu bibazo
ibi bigenwa n’iteka rya perezida rishyiraho abasoreshwa
ni mu buhe buryo imyidagaduro ishobora gutuma dushyikirana n’abadayimoni ‽

asezeye kubushake cyangwa se yirukanwe‽

ashima imikorere yabo n’uburyo yakirwa cyane cyane mu ngingo yayo ya kane
imana yongera kubwira aburahamu iti nawe uzarumbuka imbuto nyinshi
uzambike aroni imyenda yera ajye gushima uwiteka
ububasha inshingano n’imikorere by’abagize inama nkuru
hakurikijwe ibiteganywa n’iyi ngingo uratsindwa
agomba gutegura raporo za buri mwaka zishyikirizwa biro politiki 
ariko umutware umwami yegamiraga asubiza uwo muntu yishimye
niba usanzwe ufite gahunda ukurikiza yikomeze
ugomba gukosora kutubahiriza itegeko 
ibimera bibujijwe mu buvuzi ntubikoreshe
ubunyangamugayo n’ubushobozi ni ngombwa
barinaba yari umwana wo guhumuriza abahamya iby’ubwami 
inyama zitumizwa mu mahanga uretse amafi
ifite insagamatsiko igira iti twibuke twiyubaka  
yahawe ibihano mu rwego rw’akazi abatabwubahiriza 
yasanze ababigororerwamo bahabwa inyigisho n’ubumenyingiro kandi imibereho yabo yitabwaho n’ ibigo 
kurererwa ku busambanyi byinjira mu bwenge
urwego rushinzwe gutanga amasoko isobanura bihagije
yakatiwe n’icy’igifungo cya burundu y’umwihariko 
n’imiterere y’icyatunganyijwe neza
inama y’abagore yatoye abagize komite nyobozi
igitambo gitambirwa ibyaha byongerwe ku bitambo byoswa
ashinzwe n’iby’imari tekiniki na serivisi 
ubu buryo buha uwishyuye kuri buri bwoko inyemezabwishyu
iz’uburenganzira rusange mu bibazo rusange
kandi ni uko ubu busumbane mu kumenya
kandi tukajya tuzana umuganura w’irobe ryacu
sena iterana rimwe mu mezi abiri n’igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa
nk’uko byavuzwe mbere ngo uyu munsi nimwumva ijwi ryayo ntimwinangire imitima
abenshi bagomba kurisesa
dukora buri munsi n’intego dufite igaragaza ibyo dushyira mu mwanya wa mbere 
ni ikigo cy’imari iciriritse kimwe n’undi muntu wese 
ikosa ry’uruhande rumwe mu kwibeshya rishingiye ku kinyoma
ikibazo umurimo w’ubwami uteye ute‽
gishyirwaho n’ubunyamabanga bw’akarere kandi kikagenzurwa n’umunyamabanga mukuru
nanone urukuta rw’uwo murwa rwasenyutse
ibyo byadukoze ku mutima
ariko mu bisirayeli salomo ntiyagiragamo imbata
ati fata umuheto n’imyambi utabare
arabasubiza ati ufite imyenda ibiri umwe awuhe mugenzi we utawufite
iyohererezanya ry‘amafaranga ku ikoranabuhanga ni byiza

mbashimiye foyibe mushiki wacu ari we wadufashije
kuko nimbatera agahinda uwanezeza ni nde atari mwe
ingingo ya mbere gukemura impaka hakoreshejwe 
ibisinde byo mu gikombe bizamuryohera kuko imvura yaguyemo
ujye uhora wirinda amatiku
abanza kugeza ikibazo cye ku rwego rw‘umutwe w’abadepite
umutima wanjye ukayobezwa n’ibyo amaso yanjye abona
mukoresheje za zaburi zimusingiza muririmba indirimbo z’umwuka zishimishije imana 
kaminuza yo mu gihugu cy’ubwongereza ifite ishami mu rwanda
uburyo bwo kubika amafaranga bikurikije itegeko
imbonerahamwe y’uko uturere duhagaze mu mutekano mu myaka ibiri        
isi yemejwe burundu kandi atangiye gukurikizwa
afite ubunyarwanda butandukanye n’umurongo wo kubaka igihugu 
yemwe murangurure amajwi y’ibyishimo
kugira ngo umwami n’abatware banezerwe
akwiza hose ibitekerezo by’ingenzi byabo
umuntu wateye uruzabibu asigamo abahinzi ajya mu mahanga
ni inyungu z’umukiriya cyangwa inyungu rusange ‽
kwari gukoma imbere igikorwa cya kera cyo kutamenya imana y’ukuri

umushinga mpuzabihugu ugamije guhuza imikorere
byongeye buri cyemezo cya icglr kigomba gusinywaho n’impande zombi

ni ipfundo ry’umugozi w’iryo bara upfunditse hasi ahagana iburyo
ndetse no kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside

koko yehova ashobora gutandukanya abanyegiputa n’abisirayeli

kuki aba banyeshuri batarangiza umwaka wa gatatu ‽

indangabikorwa  y’ibikorwa by’ibanze

byanditse mu gitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha 
tugomba kwikorera izo ngegera tukazitsemba mu izina rya rubanda

iyo aba mbere banganyije amajwi barenga babiri asubirwamo
ububanyi n’amahanga byitabweho

abazungura bateganywa n’itegeko

bihabwe nyir’uburenganzira hamwe na kopi

ndi imbata ya kristo

iyamamaza cyangwa inyandiko isanzwe

nk’uko ryavugururwe kugeza ubu 
ababyeyi abarezi imiryango n’abaturarwanda 
nishimira mu mibabaro

afite abararirizi babiri n’abarinzi b‘irembo batatu 
abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bakeneye butaha
icyakora leah nakora icyaha azahanwe  
u rwanda ruhora rusukuye rukeye kandi rubengerana
ni imikorere y’amakoperative mu rwanda nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe kugeza ubu 
inama isanzwe iterana rimwe mu mu mezi atatu  
yagiye muri ambasade y’u rwanda i dakar wa kabiri ushize 
ryujuje ibikubiye mu itegeko
nakora iki ko numva nigunze ‽  
amababa yabyo yari agororotse rimwe rikora ku rindi
n’ibijyanye nabyo bimeze neza

hakozwe ibarura kenshi bityo bityo kugera ku rwa nyuma  
imiryango y’abayisilamu igendera ku mategeko
yaciwe amafaranga angana na miliyoni mirongo itatu n’icyenda ibihumbi magana cyenda na mirongo icyenda na bitanu

bakoresheje amategeko ari ku mugereka 
intama ebyiri cyangwa ibyana by’inuma bibiri azane ituro rishimisha imana

ingo z’umwami zari aho hakwitwa ihuriro ry’ikoro ry’umwami  
uturere dukikije abanyagerasa bamusaba kugenda akabavira mu gihugu
muri uyu mwaka wa hakomeje igikorwa cyo kubungabunga ubutaka
amafaranga asabwa mu igurisha agurana ikiguzwe
igihe abisirayeli bangaga guhindura imyifatire yabo
nzabanyanyagiza mu mahanga yose nk’imbuto mu murima
hari amalisiti abiri cyangwa menshi  
kwita ku mutekano w’abantu n’ibintu 
iki cyaha kigamije gutesha agaciro imibiri y’abazize jenoside
bahagaritswe kure no gutinya kubabazwa kwawo
giteganyijwe mu gika cya kane cy’ingingo ya kabiri
bose babibonye bahita bikubita hasi bubamye baravuga bati mana tubabarire
aya mategeko shingiro yemejwe kandi ashyizweho umukono na komite
yari umukiriya ku giti cye uwo mukiriya akaba yemewe
abakozi ba leta cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya serivise idasanzwe 
bisabwe n’umucungamutungo w’agateganyo
niba uri umwana w’imana ikize umanuke uve ku musaraba 
umuntu wese witwaza ari disikuru avugiye aho
icyicaro ku rwego rw’igihugu kiri kicukiro
itegeko ryerekeye abinjira n’abasohoka 
abanyamuryango nyir’izina bateraniye mu nama
umutware w’abisirayeli yashishimuye imyenda ye  
gukora ikosora mu minsi irindwi ibarwa vuba
ibishushanyo by’abantu bapfa n’iby’ibiguruka 
ikigo gifite ububasha bwo kubuza nyir’indege kuyinjiza
yesu arabaza ati ni nde unkozeho bose baramuseka
urwo rwego rw’ikirenga
zana ubwoko bw’amashyo yawe n’ubw’imikumbi yawe kugira ngo mbihe umugisha
urugi rukinguye kandi nta wubasha kurukinga  
nyakibanda ntiyari yo rwose  
barabinuba bitewe n’ibisebe byabo
hari ikibazo cy’imyubakire idakurikije amategeko bitewe no konona amashyamba isuri imiturire inganda n’ibindi  
yasuraga abakirisito bose atarobanura ku buryo jenoside yabaye bari bafite urukundo
n‘itsinda rimwe ry’amasosiyete ayishamikiyeho
amayezi y’amatungo mutamba ku rutambiro
gushyiraho urubuga rwo kwisanzura mu bitekerezo
akunda impano cyangwa indonke kugira ngo akire vuba
ku buryo bw’umwihariko rab igomba kwita ku buhinzi
igenzura ryakozwe ku mitangire ya serivisi mu nzego za leta iz’abikorera ryagaragaje ko bitagenda neza
inkuge irengerwa bose bakira hanze
umuhesha w’akazi ukurikira cyamunara  
kuva aho yagendeye ukageza aho yagarukiye iwe amahoro 
umushahara w’umusirikare wiyongera buri mwaka
ubwabo umunara w’umurinzi 
ushobora gutegereza umwanya muremure iyo indwara
atanga amafaranga magana atanu y’u rwanda
gufata icyemezo iyo habaye cyangwa hashobora kutugoboka
kandi uko byari biri mu minsi ya nowa ni ko biri n’ubu
mu gika kibanziriza iki birimo
kugira uruhare mu myigire y’abana
umushyitsi yari akomeye mu bihe bishize
nuko bafata ivu ryo mu mbabura baragenda
nuko nkomeza kwitegereza maze mbona inziga enye zari hafi yanjye
gahunda y’igenzura y’ingenzi mu kigo cy’imari
bishobora kubangamira ubumwe n’ubwumvikane mu muryango
bitekerezeho  ese indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina hamwe n ihungabana  byibasira abakora imibonano
babapima ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera sida mu rwego rwo kubarinda kwanduza abana babo 
bibiliya hari abagabo n abagore yavuze ko bari beza  
njyanama mu nama zifata ibyemezo bimureba 
ibinyamakuru bigatangaza ibyavugwaga n’impande zombi
ariko gishobora kuva kageyo mu karere ka gicumbi  
icibwa umuntu ku giti cye n’iyo yaba ahari
ni’iz’umuyobozi mukuru kugira ngo hizerwe neza
ni ko yehova nyir ingabo avuga murebe ko ntazabagomororera ingomero zo mu ijuru  
batashye amaso yabo akibona  
ishinzwe abana kandi rikagena inshinganozabo
yita cyane cyane ku buhinzi bw’imyaka
ni iki cyagufasha kumenya aho ujya
ese koko imana yita ku bayo
rubeni kirimo ibendera ryacyo n’imitwe yacyo 
abagenzuzi b’imari bafite inshingano zitoroshye
ese urebye ibisubizo watanze haruguru wavuga ko ukabya
aya mabwiriza ariko si jye wayatanze
polisi y’igihugu irashishikariza abakora imirimo ya gipolisi kwirinda no kugenzura ibinyabiziga mu muhanda  
bizakura ubukungu mu gihe yaba agaragaza umushinga
dawidi n’ingabo ze zose basubira i yerusalemu 
naho uturere tubiri rusizi na nyamagabe nitwo bashima izi serivisi ku gipimo kiri hasi  
ajye ayitegura imbere ya yehova kuri buri sabato
mubabere abaja n’abagaragu  
ingingo ya mbere igenzurwa ry’ibitabo 
izina ry’ahantu yandikwa itandukanye n’iryo zina 
wagiteranirije kuza kunyaga no gusahura ifeza
urubanza rusubirwamo kubera ingingo nshya byemerwa 
wavukiye gasaka nzega gasaka nyamagabe amajyepfo
imyaka irindwi izaba imyaka irindwi y’inzara 
igihe cyose icyemezo cyo kwanga inyandiko kitaraboneka birahari
ubumwe n’ubwiyunge bw’abanyarwnda 
ibyo ni byo tubandikiye kugira ngo umunezero wanyu usendere
n’abahakora by’umwihariko n’ibindi
afite ibyuma bifata amafoto agaragaza ibice
umugore yemerewe gukora imirimo iyi n’iyi
amese imyenda ye kandi yiyuhagire amazi meza
abayobozi b’ibigo by’amashuri bakwiye kwita kuri iki kibazo
yita ku bunararibonye n’ubudakemwa bw’ububiko
ubuturo bwabo azabuhindurira amatongo hejuru
nta bushobozi bwo kwitunga afite 
iom cyangwa abakozi b’ikigo gifasha mu gutuza bazabikora 
abanyarwanda batahuka bava mu bihugu duhana imbibi bibiri 
ntihakagire umuntu wo mu rubyaro rwawe unsuzugura
dore imirimo ya kamere iragaragara ni iyi ikurikira
ashobora guha urwego rusoresha keretse atarubonye
kuko ari wo byose bishingiyeho 
yabasimbuje abana babo  
nta muntu ufite uburenganzira busesuye bwo kunyaga
abatambyi bahetse babiri mu miryango yose ya isirayeli umwe muri buri muryango 
gutanga inama zishobora gukemura ibibazo
ugabijwe abakaludaya bawuteye kuko hatejwe amakuba
gutanga ubutabera mu yindi nzira kuva ku butabera buhana
ni cyo gituma umwami uwiteka avuga ati ngiye kumanuka
ni kangahe itabaza ry’abanyabyaha rijya rizima 
ibyo yehova ashaka isomo rya gatanu
igihe gishize cyagaragaje iki ‽
bashobora kujya bawuha abakuze
kandi nari umunezero wayo iminsi yose
abakuru bose n’abisirayeli bose baramubwira bati ntumwumvire sekibi
uko bavutse kurabigaragaza
wenda ugatuma abantu bagutinya
kimwe cya kabiri cy’abagiyize banditse babisaba 
arasohoka ava imbere ya farawo  
ubwumvikane bw’imyishyuranire hagati y’abantu
iyo ari umuntu utunganye buba bwatunganye
babemerera gutana n’abagore banyu
babana nta wundi wakwitwa se uretse umugabo wa nyina 
rubayita mariko aracumbitse afite ikibazo yakorewe ubuvugizi mu murenge ariko ntarafashwa
abo bahemukiye muri jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bagaragarije abakirisitu urugendo
muri byose barimbishe inyigisho z’imana umukiza wacu  
rgb izakomeza kugenzura intambwe igenda iterwa mu rwego rwo gukemura ibibazo
ingingo ya mbere imperekeza zitangwa
ubwo butaka bukaba ari bwo bukoreshwa 
ukorera cyane cyane abatishoboye n’abatagira kivurira
harimo ikigamijwe imiterere n’inzira raporo ikorwamo
politiki n’inteko nkuru 
ibibazo by’abasomyi ese inzoka iraryana‽
uburangare cyangwa igihano kiba mu gihe gito
yabini umwami w’i kanani 
ufite icyo azi ku byerekeranye n’imari 
mina ni urugero rw’uburemere reba umugereka wa kane
ingamba aburahamu yafashe ku bwa isaka zitanga ikihe cy’ikitegererezo cyiza ku bakristo 
ingingo ya munani ubuyobozi bw’agateganyo 
umwohereze mu nzu ya data 
uburyo bunoze bwo gukurikiranira hafi ibyo bibazo
umuco w’ubwisungane mu kwivuza no kugira mituweri
igihe cy’intambara igifungo cya burundu mu gihe bibaye
umwami w’i yeriko abyumvise atuma kuri rahabu ati banguka
gahunda ya ndi umunyarwanda ikangurira abanyarwanda gushyira imbere imbere indangagaciro z’ igihugu 
ku byerekeye ibitavuzwe muri aya mategeko 
mu byo uvuga no mu byo ukora
habe n’aho gukandagiza ikirenge
yehova abwira samweli ati sohoka ugende
urwego rw’icyiciro cy’imigabane
imfura ngo amusimbuze umuhungu w’umugore w’intabwa batangira kujya impaka
uwo mwana yari mwiza cyane
wakora iki igihe umwana wawe ugeze mu gihe cyo gushaka‽
igikoresho ikintu cyanditse cyangwa ikindi
urukiko rwafashe umwanzuro w’uko umuvandimwe yarengerwaga n’ingingo zo mu itegeko rigenga umuriro ahita abwira abarinzi n’abatware b’ingabo
jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu rwanda muri hagamije kureba ababa bafite uburwayi bwihariye 
minisitiri w’ubutabera n’intumwa ze
ni ibikorwa bya rbc nibura rimwe mu kwezi
ntibyakuwe imbere y’amaso
kwigisha uko ruswa ishobora kuba mu mashuri no kubashishikariza kuyikumira no kuyirinda 
umukuru w’ibaruramari wa sosiyete nshya
kandi uruhu rwanjye nirumara kubora nzareba mesiya
ese yesu ntiyigishije ko abantu bagomba koroherana‽ 
isirayeli zizabyagira ahantu hazima
kuri uwo munsi umutima w’abagabo b’abanyambaraga 
amuha umugabo we aburamu ngo amugire umugore we  
yakize kubera ko umwuka wera
inteko y’abantu bafatwa nk’aho bafite ibyo bakora
kugota aho hantu kugeza igihe impamvu zatumye ibyo biba
ni ibikorwa bigaragaramo ihohoterwa iryo ariryo ryose
igihe uruhushya cyangwa imbago zaboneka yaza 
ijuru rishya n’isi nshya bizadushimisha cyane agatabo k’iteraniro
ikigo cy’ibikorwa byo gushakashaka n’imirimo y’amabanki 
isanduku yageze i kiriyati yeyarimu ihamara igihe kirekire cyane kingana n’imyaka mike
na cyo gikomeza kigira kiti hari ibimenyetso byinshi byerekana ko iyo bimwe
guhamagaza inama igihe cyose abona ko ari ngombwa
nyuma yaho abandi banyeshuri batatu bo mu materaniro  
ibyo wakoze mu gihe gishize
ubwoko nawe nta cyo wabakijije na gito 
bashima ku kigero kiri munsi ya gatanu ku ijana 
bmuhaye ibihumbi magana atutu   
ni ku bw’impuhwe z’imana
ugize inama bidatinze inama y’ubuyobozi  
umwanditsi w’urukiko rw’ikirenga
umukono ku masezerano mpuzamahanga 
ingingo ya mbere abagize inteko itora 
umukoresha w’ikoro mukuru kandi yari umutunzi 
ibyabo bigahambanwa n’amagufwa yabo  
haba umunezero mwinshi muri uwo mudugudu 
incuro nyinshi pasiteri yabwiraga amagambo amutesha agaciro kandi akanenga imyifatire ye 
mu gihe usheshwe ku yindi mpamvu itari mu kazi
gutega no korora inyamaswa zifite amahembe ameze nk’amashami
databuja ntagenzura ibyo mubikiye byo mu rugo 
izo diyama z’intambara zajyanwaga mu mahanga rwihishwa zikagurwa
umwe mu mirongo ya bibiliya yabonye ko igira icyo igeraho
ikuzo ry ‘umwami mukuru umwami wa ashuri 
bahabwa na banki mu nama rusange 
imbaga y’abantu benshi
hasigaye iminsi mirongo itatu
sosiyete igomba kugira ingamba ziyifasha
umutwe i izina ry’umuryango
imyaka irindwi ibarwa uhereye igihe yatangiye 
umara iminsi myinshi uhuha ugatuma ubushyuhe bugabanuka cyane
haseguriwe ibiteganyijwe mu ngingo za nyuma  
byaba bivuga ko wakora neza
guteza abantu ibyago mu rugendo 
amafaranga yoherejwe mu bwoko bubiri
iyo umunoteri wikorera apfuye ahagaritse imirimo biba birangiye
yabaga ashaka ko mujyana ahantu hose
kwamamaza igihe cy’itora nyirizina no gutangaza ibyavuye mu matora 
bagenzi babo bize mu iseminari ntibahabwaga amacumbi n’ikigo
kugira ngo abakozi ba banki nkuru bacumbikirwe
ingingo ya mbere iseswa cyangwa igoboka
ayo masezerano agomba kuba ku buryo burambye  
ku birebana n’abakozi b’ikigo komisiyo yasanze ikigo gifite abakozi bateganyijwe ku rutonde
koperative kotwiange ifite icyicaro i gihembe mu murenge wa ngeruka 
mu gihe ikigo kibona ko izo mpinduka zizatuma bahomba bagifunga
kandi arihe igiciro cy’iby’ahera yimanye 
abanyeshuri babona ubufasha bwo kurihirwa mu mashuri makuru ay’imyuga no muri za kaminuza 
kandi esiteri yari ataravuga bene wabo
iyo amafaranga y’inguzanyo yatanzwe mu rujijo babikavugana 
ingingo ya mbere ibihembwe bigize umwaka
arumeniya muri werurwe bugomba kubanza gusuzumwa n’inteko ishinga amategeko 
impushya ebyiri z’imbuto z’amakomanga  
mu biro by’iyo leta y’amahanga bikora neza
cyangwa ku munsi w’impera z ‘icyumweru 
iteka rya minisitiri riha ubuzimagatozi umuryango fondation icyizere  
gutera ingabo za siriya zitera nabo
igitabo cy’irangamimerere kirimo inyandiko ye 
bagiye nk umuryango kwicara bakumvikana na twagirimana albert 
ibyemezo by’inama njyanama y’akagari
minisitiri ufite ingufu z’amashanyarazi mu nshingano
miyanimari bushingiye ku buhinzi amashyamba n’uburobyi umuceri ni cyo gihingwa gushya
ni iby ukuri ko hari bamwe babwiriza ibya kristo babitewe n’ishyari no kurushanwa
urukiko rwemeza umugabane usaba agomba kwishyura
muyiheshe ikuzo mu mibiri yanyu
inzugi zose n’inkomanizo zari zikoze kimwe 
adahari indahiro iteye itya 
ku byerekeye umuyobozi ushinzwe imari
ikigega kigenga ubujurire ku rwego rw’akarere 
babonye ako kana ko ari keza ntibatinye itegeko
ibimenyetso yahawe kandi imaze no guha agaciro
mu gihe cy intambara umusirikare wese 
yafashije umugore we n’abana be barindwi hamwe na bene wabo benshi bamenya ukuri
bavana yesu kwa kayafa bamujyana mu rukiko 
yehu aramusubiza ati nta mahoro
ibyo byatumye ntangira gushakisha abahamya ba yehova
yavuze ko abantu benshi bazarokoka bakaba mu isi nshya 
aho ziherereye cyangwa zagukiye kugaragaza
urwego rw umuvunyi rwandikiye abo bayobora amakuru mu nzego  
ibiro by’imari iby’abanyamabanki b’ingenzi
abavandimwe na bashiki bacu ntibiriwe bashaka  
ikoraniro ryabaye mu bwihisho mu ishyamba 
inama itumizwa n’umwe mu babikira
kristo anishimira ko ntirukiye mu maraha
ibiro ku rwego rw’igihugu rw’akarere  
ikindi nanone ntugaterwe isoni no gushaka umuntu wafasha
ingingo ya mbere inama y’ubuyobozi ya hec
ni urugero rwashyizweho n’igitabo cy’amabwiriza
ufite inshingano ashobora guha undi muntu
gushyira mu bikorwa iri teka
bumviye itegeko rya sekuruza naho jye narababwiraga 
iminsi y’akazi nibura byemejwe mu bitabo
isomwa ry’imanza zisabirwa gusubirwamo
unywe ku yo abahungu bavomye mu bibindi  
ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi bigaragaza ko mu yahoze ari perefegitura ya kibungo
si byo abanyamerika bemera ko nta narimwe usaza ku buryo utakwiga ibintu
bigenwa na leta mu mabwiriza yerekeye imari 
ni abagize inama y’ubutegetsi bagomba gufata icyemezo
idasanzwe yateranye ku itariki ya gatatu kanama  
imirimo yabo uko bajyaho n’uko bavaho bivugwa
asezeye mu muryango ku bushake bwe 
umuntu ku giti cye cyangwa ikigo gifite ubuzima gatozi
gusobanura urubanza rwaciwe mu buryo budasobanutse
kugira uruhare mu bikorwa bya leta
amabwiriza agenga ishyirwa ku isoko ry’ibicuruzwa byo ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane
kandi nakomeje isezerano ryanjye na bo  
gushingana ibintu biri mu nzu yakodeshejwe
abantu batariho umugayo
ahubwo yatumwe na yesu kristo n’imana
umuntu akaba ashobora kuba ari isosiyete
gukora gufata ibyemezo ku basaba ubufasha
yatumye ku bana ba isirayeli ivugishije yesu  
isubiye ku mategeko shingiro y’umuryango
yashakaga kuvuga mu gihe yasezeranyaga igikorwa cyo guhagurutsa umuhanuzi umeze nka we
umuntu wese ucuruza ibikoresho by’umukono arasora
gikomeye kandi gikize kurusha u rwanda
ati njye nari igikoresho cy’imana impa ubutumwa bwo kwita ku bana bayo 
ashinzwe n’imikoreshereze y’imari no gutanga imisanzu
hamani yabeshyeye abisirayeli ku mwami ahasuwerusi yaravuze ati hari ubwoko bubi butubahiriza amategeko yawe  
gukurikirana amakosa yo mu kazi  
iyo mizi y’intama yose uzayosereze ku gicaniro izabe igitambo gikongorwa n’umuriro 
akaba yifuza kubona avoka wamufasha mu kuburana
inama nyuguranabitekerezo ku byagezweho mu bukangurambaga 
cyangwa ibigo bigikomokaho cyangwa se inyungu
kuba yarakoraga ibibi nk’uko abahungu ba eli
imanza zisanzwe abakenera abunganizi kubera ahanini amikoro baba badafite
mu gihe iyi nkuru yandikwaga sinari mpari
nkimara kuhagera hari umupasiteri wahise antera ibuye
hakoreshejwe urwego rwo hejuru  
ibisabwa mu gufunguza konti bigenga
ibihembo n’ibindi bigenerwa abagize inama
igihe bibaye ngombwa bagenwa na leta  
rubanda ngo abirukane mu mujyi
impamvu shingiro yo gukoresha mu bucuruzi
ibyateza ingorane n’ibishobora guteza ingorane 
ari isosiyete yibumbiye mu yindi  
inshingano ze cyangwa atume hafatwa ingamba
uko ibipimo bya serivisi yemeranyweho byagaragaye
bari mu ihema ry’ibonaniro
visi perezida wa komite afite inshingano zikurikira 
maze abagabo babiri b’ibigoryi barinjira
uburenganzira ku ngwate nk’ikimenyetso cy’ingenzi
umutimanama ukeye no kwizera kuzira uburyarya
inyungu z’imirimo iruhije baba bakoze  
yesu kristo n’urupfu rwe ku musaraba 
nkunda yehova iminsi yose y’ubuzima bwanjye
intumwa z’abakozi mu kigo zikemura mu kazi
umuntu ni iki kugira ngo yere imbuto
bafite uburenganzira bwo kugufatira umwanzuro wa nyuma
ku wa mbere yatangiriye akazi 
uwo musoro ucibwa ufite ibihano bivugwa mu gika cya kane
umubare w’abantu bagaragaje ubushake
biturutse ku mirimo yabo haseguriwe ibanga
umusoro utishyuriwe igihe ugomba kubyara inyungu
igihe umugabo apfuye umugore yashoboraga guhungurwa
igihe cyose umunyamuryango yeguye ku bushake ntasubizwa
hashingiwe ku bufatanye bwa politiki ya leta
ni imiraba yo mu nyanja yarubiye
ibyo ukora ubishyire ku rubuga
bigakorwa na visi perezida iterana kandi igafata imyanzuro
bitatu bya kane by’abagize byababajijwe naho abagore ni kimwe cya kane 
cyangwa n’urundi rwego rwose rubifitiye ububasha
nta buriganya ntirifatwa nk’aho ryakorewe rubanda
niba bagezeho byaba ari ukuri 
gukoresha ibikorwa byo gukangura abahugurwa kugira ngo ubafashe gukurikira
ikuzimu hakaba havamo isoko ryahaza benshi
ni byo barahaye uwo mugenzuzi w’imari
ni umukozi ushinzwe imyitwarire n’uburere
ubwo ni ubwiza bw’icyubahiro cy’uwiteka  
untambira ishimwe ni we
impapuro nini zo kwandikaho zabonetse
hamori se wa shekemu yazanye ibice by’ifeza ijana 
umwami abwira daniyeli ati banguka
amafaranga y’itumanaho rya telefoni aba ari menshi

indi igahabwa ushinzwe inzu ifungirwamo abandi
iyo perezida adahari visi cyose bibaye ngombwa arayiyobora
ni ibihumbi magana cyenda na mirongo itanu na bitanu
umunyamabanga wa kabiri wungirije w’umuryango 
aguma mu mirimo kugeza manda nshya irangiye 
cyangwa kugerageza gukora igikorwa cyaba cyatanzwe
umwana ashyikirizwa umuryango we uwo muryango uranezerwa
bikorerwa ku rwego rw’akarere n’umurenge 
biro nyobozi ishobora gutumira mo abantu yifuza
aba ni bo bene reweli hari na nahati
ni bo banyamuryango fatizo baryo 
kuba yobu yarakomeje kuba indahemuka byagize akahe kamaro‽
ariko yehova yamubwiye ko nta gushidikanya ari uyu nguyu  
rishyirwaho n’umutwe w’abadepite cyangwa umutwe wa sena
ni uguhagararira abandi mu misoro
ahanwa n‘umukuriye mu kazi hakurikijwe amategeko  
hari abadafite ubushobozi bwo gukora ako twabafasha

uwemerewe kuba umuvugizi wungirije w’uwo muryango
agiye gutangaza ibivuye muri ubwo bushakashatsi 
n’ubwo hatera ibyago cyangwa indi ndwara yose 
urushinge rwa busole ntirwongeye kwerekeza mu cyerekezo cyaho
agakiza tugakesha imana yacu
abamarayika bakura loti i sodomu imana iramurokora
afunzwe imyaka cumi n’itandatu yuzuye 
umunyamakuru mpuzamahanga n’undi muntu uwo ari we wese
ku bwanyu ni icyitegererezo ki ‽
uwo mugore aramubaza ati nkuzurire nde ‽
usubiye ku mwanya wa guverineri w’intara mu majyaruguru‽
uburenganzira bwe cyangwa uburenganzira bw’abandi

ni abariganya b’i gileyadi

inama rusange n‘umunyamabanga mukuru arayitabira
aha n’abakuru bya bice by’ifeza mirongo itatu 
umucuruzi wese utagishoboye kwishyura arafungirwa
ni indi mpamvu ituma atarekurwa

nuko yakobo n’umuryango we batangira kwimuka
ku bwe buzamara igihe gito abiheshejwe no kwizera
abo mu rukiko rw’ikirenga n’abo mu rukiko rukuru

itegeko rya minisitiri ufite irangamimerere mu nshingano

icyifuzo cye cyumvikana muri iryo jambo  
igihe umuryango uzamara ntikigenwe n’inama rusange  
mu gihe ushinzwe imikoreshereze y’uburyo bwo butaka atabyemeye

n’umuvugizi w’umuryango yaba adahari cyangwa ahari bizabaho

nicara ndi umugabekazi sindi umupfakazi ni cyo kinkomeza

icyitegererezo cyo mu rwego rw’inganda mu rwanda

igihe giteganywa cyo kubika inyandiko mpamo 
banki nkuru y’u rwanda 
amakanzu yabo bayejesha amaraso ya ntama
inzego ziwugize n’icyicaro cyawo
anyaga ubutunzi bwo mu nzu bwose

inshuro ebyiri intera ya xi n’intera ya xii

aho inama za serikeri zaberaga ni benshi bitabiraga
yewe mukobwa w’i siyoni tega amatwi
ni bo bantu b’isi bafite umugabane wabo

ni umwanditsi mukuru mu rukiko rwisumbuye
ni inteko rusange nk’uko byagaragajwe mu butumire

bari ibihumbi makumyabiri na magana abiri

agomba kwezwa keretse koga ibirenge ngo abe aboneye

ni amatwara y’ishyaka

ikindi ni uko inama y’ubutegetsi na buri muntu akenewe
