myitwarire y’abanyamuryango n’izijyanye na byo
ubizigama kuko ari iby’igihe gishyize kera 
mukigarurire mwirukane abanzi banyu bose imbere
igice cya gatatu komisiyo y’imari 
ibyaho ni i karitani n’ibikingi byaho  
narada na karukoma kone na mudarasini
icyo gihugu kikaba cyanduye 
muri iri tegeko hakoreshwa uburyo bukurikira  
amashuri ahuriweho na leta n’abikorera ku giti cyabo
yahise yamagana satani atazuyaje  
cyangwa umukozi wese ubifitiye ububasha 
uwiteka abwira mose ati tunga ukuboko kwawe ku nyanja
ni inyigisho z’imico myiza mu mashami yose
abantu baba mu midugudu yabaye amatongo 
umuntu ukora kimwe mu bikorwa bivugwa haruguru
abantu ikintu kitabashimishije na busa ni ukubasenyera
bemerwa kuwutera inkunga iyo ari yo yose  
ndetse bakuvugirije induru
itegeko ry’amahame y’imiyoborere n’icyizere ku nzego z’ubuyobozi
ibyanjye ni ukuvuga ibyo nkora umuvandimwe ukundwa
gufasha abakene abapfakazi n’imfubyi 
kumukurikira i lakishi bamutsindayo 
nanone nzatuma imigi yanyu isenyuka no mu nkengero zayo 
yehova ni iyihe migisha tuzahabwa 
ari kure cyane kuva mu gitondo agenda
nta bisobanuro ashobora guha urwego rw’ibanze 
avura n’izindi ndwara mu bantu bafite ubumuga
abonetse afasha gusuzuma umusaruro uteganijwe
ariko mwirinde kugira ngo uwo mudendezo wanyu uyoyoke
uko muzajya murya uwo mutsima mukanywera muzakira
ati abanyeshuri bose twiganaga baganiriraga kuri interineti kandi nanjye sinifuzaga gusigara inyuma  
ni iki gitumye uyu avuga atyo arigereranyije ni iki‽
ibiteganyijwe byo gucukura mine cyangwa zahabu
gusuzuma ibibazo bahuye nabyo n’ingamba zafashwe
n’iz’iri tegeko ngenga bavuga
komisiyo isobanurira ibyo ishinzwe kubahiriza
rimwe mu cyumweru bakora isuku yitondewe  
ingingo ya munani umuryango ufite urwego rukemura ibibazo
ababuranira abahamya icumi banze kujya mu gisirikare
ubwoba no gutinya bizabafasha gukomera
bahatwa ibibazo kandi bicwa urubozo
gukora ubundi bwoko bw’akazi ubivugaho iki ‽
kuki ubusambanyi bugereranywa no gusenga ibigirwamana‽ yehova abona ate ubusambanyi ‽
elisa akiza imboga uburozi
ni iki yozefu yatekereje igihe yamenyaga ko mariya yari atwite‽
abatware mu by ubutaka yitwaga abakonde 
umukozi cyangwa umuyobozi ufite izo nshingano 
imikoranire y’izo nzego zombi 
iyo ni yo ncuti wakwizera
batandatu batowe na buri ntara bose bahuye
ingingo ya cyenda gufatirwa ibyemezo no kujurira
amande ageze cyangwa arenze atanu ku ijana
ingingo ya mbere ibyangombwa bisabwa 
dawidi agera i bayali perasimu abatsindayo  
maze izuba rivuye uwiteka ategeka umuyaga guhuha
abakomoka ku isi hose bari kwigana nawe akamenya icyongereza  
uko watoza umwana wawe kumvira nimukanguke   
umuvandimwe ukiri muto yiganye yozefu 
amagambo akoreshwa muri aya mabwiriza
gusa keretse iyo hari ugaragaje ko hari ibyo azi
buri kigega cya sitasiyo kigomba guhora cyuzuye
abashinze umuryango bashyize umukono kuri aya masezerano
ishyaka pl ni ryo ryonyine ryitandukanije n’ayandi 
urubyiruko rwateguriwe igikorwa cyo gusura inzibutso no gusobanurirwa amateka
incuti z’umukwe
n’abigishwa be na bo bari batumiwe
inzuki ziba mu muzinga cyangwa hanze yawo 
amateka n’amabwiriza n’amategeko wategetse umugaragu
gutanga inama no gufasha inzego za leta 
yicaye imyaka itatu uhereye igihe akazi ke kahaarariye
amajyambere yerekeranye n’impano
mu bwanditsi bw’urukiko rw’ikirenga 
isuzuma ry’igenzuragaciro ryigenga rikorwa buri mezi atatu
inka ye iguye mu nzira ntuzihugenze ntuzabure kuyegura
ku byerekeye abagenzacyaha b’umwuga bari bamenyeshejwe
y’igihangano ku buryo nta washobora kucyanga
uzabasubize uti buhanuzi icyo nzabaca ni iki‽
icyo nshaka kimwe ni uko wemera ibyaha byawe byo gukoreramo inama n’ibindi bikoresho
umujyanama w’ubuzima faransina we uzi igihe umwana wawe azavukira 
ni amategeko n’amabwiriza akurikizwa muri ibyo bigo
kandi nzakujugunya mu butayu wowe n’amafi
ngiye gusanga abakomeye mvugane na bo kuko ndasumbirijwe
binyuze mu kubukoresha abaheburayo  
ibikorwa by’itunganywa ry’imijyi 
ku buryo buziguye cyangwa butaziguye biri mu bitabo
ku birenge byawe bakwite umurwa w’uwiteka 
nimumve imbere mwa nkozi z’ibibi mwe 
uwo mwanya yikirana mu bwato n’abigishwa be 
ari bo bubaka iyo nzu y’imana mu kibanza cyayo 
fasha imfubyi n’umupfakazi kugira ngo babeho
impamvu ry’izahurwa ry’isosiyete
ni abahungu be bombi umwe yitwa gerushomu
iyo inyandiko ihamagarira rubanda kugura ibikoresho
mu buryo ikunze kugaragazwamo
uburebure bwayo bwari imikono ibiri
abantu magana cyenda n’umunani bafungiye ibyaha bya jenoside 
ubwandu bwa sida bwibasira ubwirinzi bw umubiri wabugereranya n’udusimba turya umubiri
yehova mana yanjye ibyo ni ibiki‽
n’inshingano by’isosiyete cyangwa ku byo isosiyete ikeneye
kuki yarinda kukwica byatuma bazabimenya 
wowe yowabu  na we ati  ni jye  aherako aramwica
ubuzima butunganye bwa yesu bwabaye incungu yacu
kureba niba inama zatanzwe mu rwego rukuru
inama nyobozi cyangwa n’abagize inteko rusange 
kivugwa haruguru rigahuzwa n’ibitabo
kuvuga amasengesho y’urudaca baryarya imana
ibiti n’amashami bigabanya ingorane ziturutse ku muyaga
bikemezwa n’ibyemezo by’inama
ibitaro by’intara ibitaro by’uturere ibitaro by’indwara zo mu mutwe bya ndera n’ibigo nderabuzima 
cyangwa kuvanaho uruhushya mbere y’uko rutangwa
akunda kuburira abantu bakorwaho iperereza 
na avimu na para na ofura 
mu gihe ari ivanwaho cyangwa ishyirwaho
aharanira icyagirira diyoseze umumaro mu kubahiriza amategeko
bikorwa mu nteko z’abaturage ku rwego rw’akagari  
bivugwa mu gika cya mbere cy’iyi ngingo  
jya ureba igihe cyiza cyo kubibabwira  
ntugasabe ababyeyi bawe uruhushya ngo ubabuze amahwemo bakiva ku bakibyuka
abisirayeli barahaguruka babamba amahema mu mutwe
ayiya inshoreke ya sawuli icyo yakoze ni ukwihana
wakora iki se ngo iyo migabane yindi ibe yakemererwa
inama rusange itumizwa hasigaye iminsi mirongo itandatu ngo iterane
icyiciro cya mbere politike n’uburyo ikorwa
kuki bene se bakoze icyo gikorwa kibi‽
dufata ubufasha mu by’amategeko nk’inkingi y’iterambere
imirimo yo gutangira kubaka uyu muhanda ntiratangira bitewe nuko hari ibikibura
akora ibyo ari byo byose byo guhaza irari ry’ibitsina 
ingingo ya munani isuzumwa ry’ubwenegihugu 
mbona goretti n’abana be ndabafata mbazana iwanjye kuko bari bananiwe
bateranira hamwe bayiroheho nk’uko ubibonye
basanga ibaruramari rirengera n’iyo sosiyete  
imbonerahamwe y’ubujurire bujyanye n’imicungire y’abakozi ‘ inzego bwaturutsemo 
yakatiwe igifungo kitari munsi y’amezi atandatu  
iyo ikimenyetso kimurika cyagenewe ibinyabiziga bihagaze hakomeje gukora amatara
visi perezida afasha perezida amusimbura igihe adahari
filimi irangiye igaragaramo umusore w’ingimbi n’umukobwa w’umwangavu
afite ibaruwa igaragaza igihe amara ku mirimo 
nongera kuvuga nti muzajya mubikora mutya
abarwaye bahabwa uruhushya cyangwa ikiruhuko 
muri mwe ubwanyu hazaduka abantu bagoreka ukuri 
uturere twa gakenke gicumbi nyanza nyaruguru huye gatsibo rwamagana rusizi 
uwanditse ku rwego ruhanitse bakorana ku buryo buhoraho 
agira igitsure ariko ubutegetsi bwe ntiburamba
izo ndabyo ni imbuto z’indozi zihishije byameze kuri iyo nzu
kudatanga umusanzu wa sendika birahanirwa
hagaragara abantu bahunze bakoze
ariko se ubwe koko yakoze iby’urugomo 
udutabo tungana n’ijana dufunze neza
hitaruye inzira zo gusohoka mu gihe wihisha 
bukurikiza ubusanzwe nk’ubwo gusaba
iburanisha ry’urubanza rikorwa n’ubushinjacya
igabagabanya ry’umutungo ku buryo bungana
ni abanyeshuri bo mu myaka uwa mbere n’uwa kabiri
abafashe yesu bamujyana kwa kayafa
ubwo nategekaga abacamanza gutwara ubwoko bumwe
b ibyiringiro mu rwanda 
cyangwa bufite ibindi busaba kubahiriza 
cyo guca imanza no kwambara mu gituza
kureba ko amafaranga ari menshi
ibitekerezo rusange bisabwe n’inama y’ubutegetsi
ingingo ya mbere igihe amabwiriza atangirira
uwo mwenda ukomeza kubarwa kuri sosiyete
ageza raporo y’ibikorwa by’inama y’ubuyobozi ibyagezweho
ingingo ya kabiri inama y’ababerewemo imyenda
ishusho yo haruguru iratwereka ko ababajijwe babeshya
inyandiko yose itanzwe ihamagarira rubanda kuza 
mu kazi ahakorerwa akazi hagomba isuku
amakuru ajyanye n’ubutaka 
radiyo ubifitiye ububasha ashobora gubisaba umuntu uhakora
ubugenzuzi bukuru bw’ubushinjacyaha mu gihe bikenewe
mwancumuyeho ni ko uwiteka avuga 
ashuri letushi na lewumi amagambo y’igiheburayo yakoreshejwe kuri ayo mazina ashobora guhinduka
naho icyerekeye imikoranire n’inzego z’ibanze cyaherutse ibindi
indwara y’ubuhumekero y’inka
umujyi wa kigali ni urwego rw’igihugu
kuko imana ivuga rimwe 
gishinzwe ibijyanye n’isoko ry’imari n’imigabane
ukawukoresha gusa ku cyo ari cyo cyose
ni iki yosiya arimo akora nk’uko umubona 
ba bandi babiri basutsweho umuriro
afite ububasha bwo gutegeka ko isosiyete itanga imisoro
inzu yabo hakoreshejwe ubufindo 
ihamagarwa kandi ikayoborwa na perezida buri gihembwe  
afite icyemezo gisinyweho n‘ababerewemo imyenda
atinya ibihano bimwe na bimwe
mu gihe ibiro by’ivunjisha bidakurikije amategeko
bikorerwa mu turere ku buryo bukurikira hakurikijwe ubwiganze bw’abaturage batuye akarere 
kuva akiri muto atangira gushaka umwana w’imana ya sekuruza dawidi 
ibyakoreshejwe ku cyaha biri ku butaka bwabo
izo nzego zatoranyijwe hashingiwe ku ngingo eshatu z’ingenzi  
inzego zifite mu nshingano imicungire y’imari
umukozi wa leta akora uko ashaka
abashinzwe uburyo bwo kwishyurana
ushinzwe igikorwa cy’ubucuruzi akorana n’ikigo 
inzu ya isirayeli imara iminsi ine
bamenyere hamwe y’uko ukuboko k’uwiteka ari ko gushoboye
impano zikomoka mu ijuru
inama nkuru y’umuryango ishinzwe ibi bikurikira  
ishobora kandi ikoresheje amabwiriza
aziyogosheshe ariko ntaziyogosheshe aho iyo ndwara iva
kwandika umugabane ku isoko ry’imari
iki kibanza gifite n’igice cya nyabihu  
ingorane zikomeye nta buryo zavaho
uburyo bw’ibyemezo by’inkiko no kubisuzuma
ijambo rya yehova ryanjeho muri iyo myaka makumyabiri n’itatu yose
ikibo cy’amajwi mu gihe cy’inama y’isosiyete  
igomba gusobanura ku buryo buhagije ibice byayo
gufata ibyemezo byihutirwa mu izina rye
kuki tugomba kuba abantu barangwa n’isuku 
hari ibendera cyangwa ibimenyetso biranga igihugu
umuyobozi uwo ari we wese wagize uruhare muri icyo gikorwa
muri afurika y’u burasirazuba n’iyo mu magepfo ni impunyu zihatuye
amaze imaka makumyabiri n’itanu avutse isi ayimaraho imyaka cumi n’itandatu arwaye
yitabaje abagenzuzi n’impuguke mu mumibare
n’amakondera n’ibintu by’ubwoko bwose bivuga 
hari ibyo ashinzwe atakoze neza igihe cyose  
umwami ntiyabashije kubakiza kandi ntiyashoboye kubabonera umuti wabakiza icyo gisebe  
kugeza itariki icyo cyemezo kizarangiriraho 
bitabujije ko banakurikiranwa mu rwegorwisumbuye
ariko bene wabo barya arabazi 
igomba gukora ku buryo yigaragaza
cyangwa ukuriye ishami bakoramo ibyerekeye undi
kubera ko ukuri kuguma muri twe
asaba amasosiyete kumuha amakuru nyayo
mosiyo ntisabwa mu gihe cyose 
umugabo wo muri afurika y’epfo witwa eldred wakuriye ako kanama
ibyo bisaranganywa abana ba nyakwigendera
bikozwe rimwe mu mezi abiri n’igihe cyose bibaye
imana ishinja abayuda ubuhemu
abakuru n’abayobozi b‘amashami 
bafite ubwigenge busesuye igihe bakora
inzu yari imbere y’umwanya uciye hagati ahagana haruguru
abagaragu bawe ku uwiteka imana yawe twe gupfa 
ibikorwa by’umujyi wa kigali birihuta
clodia yabonye akazi ko gusukura amazu yishyurwaga mu ntoki
ku bibazo bijyanye n’inshingano zayo 
amakoperative yiyandikisha mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’amakoperative 
iby’ingenzi bigize ubuzima
igihumbi na magana abiri na mirongo urwenda 
atanga ikiguzi cy’ibyo yangije 
iperereza n’ibindi bikorwa by’ingenzi bya leta
urumuri rusa n’icunga rihishije kandi igatanga ahagana inyuma urumuri rutukura 
bahongerere abisirayeli bose kuko umwami
uburyo bikoreshwa mu buryo bwiza
byongeye kandi bavandimwe ndababwira ko igihe gisigaye kigabanutse cyane
ifatwa ku mpamvu z’iri tegeko 
iyo adahari cyangwa hari izindi mbogamizi
umwami rehobowamu azisimburwa
yesu yazuwe ari ikiremwa
agaciro kawo kiyongeye cyangwa kakagabanuka
ubwo bubasha bukaba bwarahawe sosiyete
ingengo y’imari ya rnra yemezwa kandi nawe
cyangwa ngo muhagarike imitima naho mwaba muhari
ibyanditswe byera biba muri bibiliya 
ni uko imyanzuro yatanzwe n‘inteko ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi  
dukeneye ubutunzi burambye
ngeze ku muryango wa ambasade uwo musirikare yanshyikirije umukozi wa amabasade w’amagara make wambajije icyangenzaga 
muri rusange y’uko imicungire y’abakozi ihagaze kuzifasha gukumira mu buryo bwihuse
umutwe w’inteko ishinga amategeko waje mu cyaro
amabanki kandi agomba kuyiha inyungu
ahabwa inkunga y’ingoboka  
umutambyi azatangire impongano uwo muntu waje kwihumanuza imbere ya yehova 
wa muntu waje kwihumanuza azamese imyenda ye  
akayunguruzo k’imirasire y izuba byitwa ods mu magambo ahinnye
kuko akanwa k’uwiteka nyiringabo ari ko kabivuze 
hanyuma apima uburebure bwarwo abona imikono mirongo ine
ku wa gatanu wiyemeje gukora iki ngo urengere ibidukikije 
amasezerano y’umuryango w’afurika y’iburasirazuba yashyiriweho umukono arusha muri tanzaniya  
bazamarane na nyina iminsi irindwi gusa ku bigaragarira amaso ye ntiyishimye
nk’uko yagusezeranije nawe ukibwira uti ndarya
ibijyanye n’isoko ry’imari n’imigabane 
gukemura by’agateganyo ibibazo bizigwa nyuma
uburenganzira n’inshingano by’abakozi bo mu ruganda
arikidiyosezi gatolika ya kigali ni imwe mu madiyosezi y’u rwanda
gutanga serivisi no guteza imbere imiyoborere myiza 
iri teka rigena mu buryo burambuye amakuru atangwa
agakino ni agakinamico kagufi aho abahugurwa bakina berekana igikorwa cyihariye
avuye mu rusengero no ku nzu ye
ababerewemo imyenda babisuzume igihe gihagije
izo mbuto abandi bavuga ko zitera  
uwiteka unzure nk’uko imbabazi zawe ziri hafi
bivugwa cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya mbere n’iya kabiri
urwego rubishinzwe ku bufatanye n’urwego rukuru
bigomba kugezwa kuri perezida wa repubulika mu nyandiko
ni ugukoresha amakuru abitse mu buryo bugezweho
ni uko amubwira ibyari mu mutima we byose 
ubwenge agitera kugubwa neza 
inama y’abanyamuryango ndetse no kudahuza mu mvugo
asaba ubufasha kugira ngo ukomeze
yaka imisanzu n’undi mutungo 
ubwa kabiri cyangwa yarohererejwe urupapuro rumuzana
nk’uko bigaragara kuri iyo shusho nta ndabo zariho  
bishyirwaho umukono n’uwayiyoboye n’umwanditsi wayo 
ibyo yarose bisobanura kandi ko agiye gukira
abasirikare bashaka kwica imbohe kugira ngo zishire
umudendezo w’abaturage ugifite imbogamizi zikwiye gukurwaho ingamba zikwiriye gufatwa
umunyarwanda uba mu murenge wa kimironko 
n’ibihembo bicungwa na kaminuza y’u rwanda 
akwiza umwuka mubi mu bayoboke no mu baturage
ishusho y’uko  abaturage babona serivisi z’ubutabera mu mwaka ushize ku rwego rw’intara   
ni imana yanyu kandi muzaba abagaragu be 
icyiciro cya mbere ibyaha bibangamira abandi
kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside ndetse n’izindi
yasaturiye ibitare mu butayu ibanywesha amazi
ku kibuga cy’imyidagaduro n’ahandi hantu hahuriye abantu benshi
mu gihe bisabwe kandi byemejwe n’ubwiganze bw’amajwi
mu minsi makumyabiri ikurikira umunsi abimenyeyeho
by’umwihariko iryo hinduka ryitaweho cyane 
hashize iminsi icumi uhereye igihe yarumiwe 
ibikorwa byo gutunganya amazi yakoreshejwe byatangiye  
amaze gusubira ku ruhande rw’umuhanda umuyobozi w’imodoka ifite uburemere yarahirimye
ubucungagereza bushyirwaho n’iteka rya perezida 
hazatinya hahindishwe umushyitsi ni uko uwiteka avuze
yerusalemu kandi umurwa uzashyirwa hejuru
atuye mu karere ka kicukiro mu mujyi wa kigali 
byizwe mu ibanga kandi hakurikije ubwiganze bw’amajwi
kwiyandikisha ku ilisiti y’itora cyangwa kuyivugurura
atanze gatanu ku ijana by’umwenda
icyo cyemezo cy’umukono ukozwe mu izina rye
umurwa mukuru w’u rwanda icyakora cyo warahindutse
wakoze ibyo utagenewe ugamije kuyobya rubanda
bageze mu mugi witwaga sowari yehova yagushije kuri nowa ibyago
washenye ingo ze zose
yamusuye arabyishimira cyane
icyakora abo bavandimwe bataye urukundo
urwego rw ubugenzuzi rwo mu gihugu cyangwa rwo hanze
gishyikirizwa minisiteri ifite imari mu nshingano
ikigo ndfi ntikigomba kongera cyangwa kugabanya inyungu
imirimo ya ngombwa kugira ngo birangire
imashini zandika nka za mudasobwa ibikoresho byo gufata amajwi kutagira ibiro ndetse no kutagira aho kuba
ndi inde ngo mbakize kandi icyubahiro cyawe uzagisiga
ibyo yamukoresheje hagati yanyu birahagije
umuntu ufite uburenganzira bwo kudandaza
kimwe mu icumi babizane mu nzu y’imana
abayobozi b’inkiko cyane cyane mu ngingo zaryo za nyuma
nguhaye gutwara urugo rwanjye kandi abantu banjye ndabakuragije
nta ruhushya rugomba kumara igihe kirekire 
amukura mu gituza cye amuzamukana mu mugongo
iyo indwara y’ibisazi yagaragaye mu yandi moko
igomba gukorwa abaturage bakungurana ibitekerezo ku byabateza imbere  
nuko sawuli ahamagaza ingabo zose ngo bahure
kudakorera igihe igenzura ry’ibigo nderabuzima bitera ingorane
itegeko ryemerera kwemeza burundu amategeko ashyiraho ikigo mpuzamahanga gishinzwe ubukungu
ikigo gishinzwe abantu n’ibintu riam n’ingingo zose z’amategeko
abasigaye batarageza ku myaka cumi bagaruke
ni umuntu w’umukorerabushake ku gipimo cyo hejuru  
ubuyobozi busabwa gushyikiriza umushinjacyaha ibi ikurikira
ni umunyamabanga w’ishyirahamwe ryabo
imbonerahamwe y’uko uturere duhagaze mu mutekano mu myaka ibiri ishize       
inzego na gahunda zikurikira 
uzi uko ikintu gisobanurwa n’ubwenge bw’umuntu
isa cyangwa imirimo ijya gusa 
satani n’abadayimoni be bahagurutse
kugira ngo umuntu mu gukora imirimo ye byihute 
umwami amaze gutwika umuzingo n’amagambo
imikorere itanoze ya ba rwiyemezamirimo bashinzwe gukurikirana ubuhinzi
akora nabi icyo yahawe keretse ugenewe isezeranya
ntimushobora gusangirira ku meza amwe
kandi ikayoborwa mu buryo bumwe nk’ubw’inama isanzwe
mu murenge wa muhoza mu karere ka musanze
ku munsi wa mbere maze imuzanira umugabo adamu yarishimye cyane 
gahunda y’ibikorwa remezo
iyo umuntu yanze ibibazo ku bushake bwe  
bagere intera ziva aho intumbi y’uwishwe iri 
ibyemezo bigaragaza ibice fatizo by’imigabane
umwana wawe ashobora kukugisha impaka ku kintu runaka ashaka gusa kugusaza
nk’urwego rushinzwe imyitwarire yabo
bitewe n’ibihe ibyerekanwa birimo hashobora kubaho ibihe bya vuba
akarere ka gasabo mu mujyi wa kigali 
nuko atangira gushakisha uburyo bwiza bwo kumuha amafaranga  
abaza umukozi we ku byerekeye imikoreshereze y’iyo mari
bagenzi banjye bampatira kumva indirimbo zidakwiriye
ni iki twakora ngo tube abanyabwenge 
nuko icyo kiyoka kibonye tuje kiragenda
wumva ko ibitekerezo bihereranye n’amahame mbwirizamuco ari byo by’ingenzi kurusha ibindi byose 
sosiyete ifite ibibazo byihariye 
yateje igihombo ariko nta bundi buriganya 
ingingo ya mbere ururimi shingiro
ibigenderwaho bishingiye ku mwenda
ipompo igira uburyo bwayo bwo kuvoma
ubushobozi buke cyangwa imikorere mibi bisanzwe
uwo ntazagibwaho n’urubanza rw’amaraso
icyemezo cy’imigabane gishyirwaho umukono mu ruhame
babinyujije mu biganiro by’urubyiruko 
umwanzi wanjye na we ati ndakubonye koko 
kuki yesu yahaga agaciro abantu babi
abatishoboye icyiciro cya ii 
ariko bo baza mu gitondo cya kare  
mu gihe cyagenwe cy’ukwezi kwa abibu ujye umara igihe usenga
imicungire y’uburyo bwo kwishyurana 
gushyigikira ibikorwa bitsura amajyambere
ibitambo byatambiwe uwiteka bigakongorwa
akoresha ingufu cyangwa amayeri hagamijwe kubana
abasaga ku ijana bo hirya no hino ku isi bashobora kuboneka
ikinyabiziga kimara gihagaze kugira ngo abantu cyangwa ibintu byinjire 
ambasade y’u rwanda muri nigeria yayoboye igikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya makumyabiri  
n’izabikorera bitabiriye urwo rugendo rwatangiriye ku nteko ishinga amategeko ku kimihurura 
ni amabwiriza ndetse no kuzana impinduka ziganisha ku iterambere n’imibereho myiza
twakora ibyo imana ishaka mu mibereho yacu  
imirimo y’umukomiseri irangira iyo ashaje
yaramubwiye ati uri umunyandoneziya none mbwiza ukuri
yesu yavuze ko rwari ukwigomwa
ugomba kuyiha amakuru ku kibazo icyo ari cyo cyose
azaba imbere ya yehova    
ibibazo bishingiye kuri bibiliya 
imbaraga y’imashini yari ikiri hasi  
ni iteraniro ryose ry’abisirayeli
ese wari ubizi mu bihe bya kera yezu yariho
uzakugeza ahantu bahita peresi
mu minsi yabanjirije umwuzure bararyaga baranywaga 
urugero ni nko gushyira mu kaga mugenzi wawe
imvugo mpuzamahanga yemewe muri tekiniki 
filipo aterura amagambo ahera kuri ibyo byo hejuru
naho inama y’imboni zo mu nzego z’ibanze yabaye ku wa gatanu ushize
cyangwa ngo amubwire bene ako kageni
ibyo aribyo byose mu ikurikirana byavuzwe mu ma banki
ushyira ku isoko imigabane kugira ngo abone
dore barimo barica abatutsi bose kandi namwe barabica 
kuki dukwiriye gusuzuma inkomoko y’iminsi mikuru ikundwa
ushinzwe gukurikirana iby’amategeko 
buri gihe kugira ngo badakomeza guhangayika
umuturage utuye i nyanza mu murenge wa busoro yatanze ikirego
iyo sosiyete itanga serivisi zo gucunga umutungo 
hari abimurwa ku mpamvu z’inyungu rusange 
nk’akoreshwa amata y’ifu ashobora kubatera indwara y’impiswi
turi mu isi y’abahemu
igihe cyo kuvuka maze ngafunga inda ibyara ni ko imana ivuze
ati ambuka uze i makedoniya
ikibuno gikwiriye indogobe n’inkoni na yo ikwiriye ibitugu
umugore w’umutima wese yubaka urugo  
inama iyishamikiyeho mu gihe urubanza rutangijwe 
maze tugatoza umwe muri bo akaba pasiteri 
mu mahanga hari urwari rwanditswemo ngo nibatahe 
ibikorwa ku buryo bwihuse 
ntukongere kumbwira iryo jambo 
kwishyura k’uwishyura bikorwa hifashishijwe telefoni
ibakure icuzwe mu ifeza ipima ibiro bibiri
ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane  
ubikora agamije igikorwa cy’iterabwoba ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu
bagiraga bati ni iki cyatuma abami ba ashuri baza inaha
salomo ageze mu za bukuru abagaragu be batangira kuyobya umutima we buhoro buhoro    
minisitiri ufite rib mu nshingano ze agena amategeko ngenderwaho
umuryango mu ishoramari ry’umwishingizi wemewe 
bafite inshingano yo gutunganya ibijyanye n’amata
batema igiti gitoshye cyose baherako bahatambirira ibitambo
ku matsinda y’abahinzi n’amakoperative
indwara yandura cyangwa utundi dukoko
sezari ishobora kumwambura uburenganzira bwe
imana yawe nzima ko nta mugati mfite uretse agafu kuzuye ikibo
ntukihorere ahubwo ujye utegereza ko yehova azakosora ibintu
akanama gashinzwe umutekano karabirwanyije biba iby’ubusa  
umusaza aramubaza ati urava he ukajya he‽
cyangwa atakatiwe n’inkiko 
kuba abatutsi baba ibwami no kuba abahutu bitinya shefu mbanda we
utari umunywi wa vino cyangwa umunyarukoni namubanze ibuye
biteganywa mu cyemezo gihindura imbago 
mu mwaka yagiyemo muri iyo myaka ntizizibagirana  
ibibazo yesu yakoze iki igihe yabonaga abantu bacururiza amatungo
akurikije ubushobozi mu mibereho myiza ye ni iy’u rwanda 
gutegura amategeko yihariye y’umuryango no kuyakurikiza
kandi azagenda yitwikiriye mu mutwe
yerekana ubuhanga n’uburyo busobanutse
nimugoroba hari umuvandimwe waje yiruka agana iwacu afite ubwoba atinya abajura
byose kizatangwa n’abisirayeli iki gihugu kibe gakondo yabo 
abamarayika b’amatorero arindwi naho ibitereko birindwi
kandi uzi ko ntari umunyabyaha ko ari nta cyaha ngira
ryubahirizwa guhera igihe ritangarijweho mu igazeti ya leta ya repubulika y’u rwanda
minisitiri w’intebe ashyirwaho bitarenze amezi atandatu
umugaba w’ingabo ati imbohe pawulo yampamagaye 
jya uba maso utahure imigambi y’umubisha
umuntu wese ukora icyaha cy’iyezandonke arahanwa
umuyobozi uwo ariwe wese w’umuryango arakomeye
cyangwa imitwe irwanya ubutegetsi bw’i kigali ikorera hanze 
bigomba guha cyangwa gushaka uziha impunzi mu minsi yazo ya mbere muri amerika 
igihe yajyanywe mu kindi gihugu byararangiye
pilato arongera arababaza ati kubera iki‽
amategeko agenga impunzi yaba ari wenyine cyangwa ari benshi
umwami w’i hasori abyumvise arumirwa
bubatse n’inzu z’imikino y’amahirwe
kikamenwamo ivu n’imirima yose yerekeye intumbi
ku misanzu y’abanyamuryango impano n’imirage 
mu gihe cy’iminsi mirongo itatu cyangwa irengaho
iterambere ry’abaturage  
ahanga imiterere ikoreshwa n’ibiranga ikigo
ntukifuze umugore w’undi
umwaka utaha nk’iki gihe nzagaruka aho uri kandi umugore wawe sara azabyara umwana w’umuhungu  
kugirango amasezerano na rwiyemezamirimo wubaka imirimo yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri asoze
abashinzwe cyangwa agasubiza ibinyoma
mu kugena agaciro k’umutungo w’isosiyete inama iraterana
umutimanama wawe ukajya witondera ibyo yakwihanangirije 
na bo ntibakibonekerwa n’uwiteka 
mu gika kibanziriza iki yabanaga n’abagore benshi
abenshi bicwa n’ayo mazi kuko arimo imyanda 
ibihumbi magana atanu by’amafaranga y’u rwanda
abasabira imbabazi yehova abwira mose ati cura inkoni y’icyuma uyimanike 
nihagira umbwira ko ibyo bibiliya ivuga bitagihuje n’igihe sinzamwemera
asaba isangiramutungo ku nyubako yandikisha igice gisigaye
kugenzura imikorere y’inzego zimwe na zimwe
yandika ibaruwa isaba kongererwa igihe yakiriwe 
iki gitabo ntikigomba kugurishwa ni kimwe mu bitangirwa ubuntu
igiciro gikurikira niwe ucyegukana
yananiwe ubuzima bw’ikindi gihugu mu gihe gito
umusoro w’ipatanti n’umusoro ku nyungu z’ubukode 
igitabo gikubiyemo ibyumweru nibura bibiri
kugira uruhare mu iterambere no ku bukungu
ubuyobozi bw’uturere bubizirikana bukabigira ibyatwo cyane cyane kubyitaho
bukeye otiniyeli mwene kenazi murumuna wanjye kandi mfite uburenganzira bwo kurya icyo nshaka
bimara nibura iminsi cumi n’itanu ngo inama iterane 
inyandiko zerekeye umutungo afitemo inyungu 
bigaragazwa n’agaciro kari kuri konti
ushobora kubaza abahugurwa mu magambo igice cy’aho bageze
ipiganwa rikorwa iyo ari ipiganwa risesuye 
inyandiko zihamagarira rubanda kugura imigabane
umwunganizi wa na leta asaba kubyitaho
muri rusange iyo nzu y’umurage w’amateka ya jenoside ukubiyemo ibice bibiri  
ingingo ya kane guteza imbere ubumenyi ku mutungo
ingingo ya mbere kuvanwa ku kazi
urukiko rw’ikirenga rwashyikirijwe inyandiko zose
ku byerekeranye n’isuzumwa ryayo kugira ngo birangire
akakizingira mu ruhago rw’amakaye 
ni imihango yakozwe guhera ku cyemezo cy’umuryango
mwirinde guhungabanya umutekano mu rwanda 
bazabasahura babafate mpiri maze babajyane 
mu mahanga n’amakurushingiro ku ikurikiranwa ryabo
jya ufasha uwo mwajyanye kubwiriza umurimo w’ubwami   
inshingano zihuye n’iz’umuryango kugirango zisozwe
mucunguze uburyo umwete kuko iminsi ari mibi 
igihe cyose ubushinjacyaha bukuru burimo kwiga
abantu bafite inyota yo kwiteza imbere
ngomba kunywa imiti kugirango ntapfa kuko ari ko nategetswe 
abakobwa b’inkumi beza bose mu nzu y’abagore mu murwa w’igihugu
niba usaba ari itsinda saba igenzura nyaryo 
ni nde muri mwe wiganyira wabasha gutera imbere
ugomba gusuzuma inyandiko zohererejwe ishyaka pdi
iterana kandi igafata ibyemezo ku buryo bwimbitse
nibategure ameza n’imyanya isobanutse
amusaba ko yaburizamo ubugome bwa hamani w’umwagagi n’umugambi mubisha yari yacuze wo kumurimbura
hari imirimo abandi badakunze gukora urugero nko kudoda
cyangwa ikayoborwa na visi perezida iyo perezida
gusobanurira abahugurwa ko ushaka kuvuga agomba kuzamura urutoki
asanze ari urukiko rw’igenzura ry’imirimo y’isosiyete  
amakuru yatangajwe mu itangazabumenyi n’itumanaho  
mugomba guteranyiriza gusana no kuvugurura 
umuryango udaharanira inyungu ufite izina bisa n’uwahawe ubushize
jya wita ku byo ukeneye mu muryango
banyegiputa nimugenda ntimuzagenda ubusa 
kigomba gushyirwa mu ngengo y imari ya leta
ni ukuvuga amategeko icumi y’imana
n’ahandi hantu hose mu mbibi za repubulika y’u rwanda
hashyizweho uburyo bushya bwo kunoza imicungire y’inkunga zitangwa ku nzibutso
urukiko rwa gisirikare rugizwe na perezida n’abamufasha
tumenye ibanga ryo kunyurwa n’ibyo utunze
kandi nanditse amategeko yanjye mu mitima yabo  
yari mwene kenani mwene arupakisadi na mwene ashulu
mbese koko uri umuntu w’umunyakuri
iryo jwi twaryumvise rivugira mu ijuru ubwo twari turyamye
amaze kubona ko nka minisitiri ufite ibikorwa remezo mu nshingano atwitayeho
gishobora kongerwa inshuro nyinshi bibaye ngombwa
baranenga no guhitamo abagenerwabikorwa ba girinka batitaye ku byiciro by’ubudehe   
kandi buzakongeza ibihuru byo mu ishyamba
abanyamuryango b’icyubahiro ni abantu batanga inama zitandukanye
aho bigeze nta cyizere cy’ejo hazaza heza bari bafite
inzoga icuruzwa atayivanyeho atayihagaritse cyangwa atayivuyeho
abayobozi ni abatorerwa n’inteko
ati hagarara mu rugo rw’inzu
abarinzi b’amarembo babaga bari ku marembo atandukanye
mu gihe asanga biri mu nyungu za rubanda 
yesu arabasubiza ati musenye uru rusengero
ishusho ry’igishushanyo ndangamiterere rikozwe
insanganyamatsiko y’umwaka igira iti umurimo unoze umusemburo w’iterambere rirambye  
ni nyoko yagiriye ku gise igihe kirekire
umwambuzi kirimbuzi nta gitwikirizo afite 
mbere yo kugena ingoboka yihariye ni ukubitegura  
ingingo za leta n’ibyemezo bibiri   bikurikiranye 
mushobora kohereza umuntu wo kubitaho kandi agateza imbere umurimo wo kubwiriza 
minisitiri w abakozi ba leta n’umurimo yadusuye
ibyo bigakorwa gusa n’umuntu bireba
byari biteye ubwoba ku buryo bose batangaye cyane maze basingiza imana
ubujyanama bukorewe umuntu ku giti cye siporo imikino imihango n’imigenzo ya kinyaranda
twahangana dute n’ibibazo dufite mu rubyiruko
na yo azanywa adandabirane asare abitewe n’umurengwe
ingingo ya mbere kugaragaza izina rya sosiyete 
imanza z ubucuruzi imari n’imisoro ziri mu nkiko zinyuranye
kuko asubiza nk’abanyabyaha amaherezo azicwa
aravuga ngo ngiye kwirirwa nizunguza hejuru y’ibindi biti mbitegeka
batinye abantu kuko bo bemeraga ko ari umuhanuzi
ibyaturutse mu kanwa ke byose yabyumviyeho  
byaturutse mu kubura ukwizera kwabo
yehova nyir’ingabo aravuze ati nimukomere mwebwe abubaha imana
umunyarwanda wese utuye mu rwanda yubaha amabwiriza y’igihugu
hamwe n’abagize imiryango yabo bemeye ukuri  
umuvandimwe azisi yaje kuba umusaza w’indahemuka  
ibibazo byo mu rwego rw’ubutegetsi ku babishinzwe babisuzumye
dufashwa n’imiryango idaharanira inyungu kimwe na leta
ni uko ntashoboye gusubira mu rugo
amabwiriza ya minisitiri ufite gutwara abantu yakoresheje inama
imyitwarire y’abantu babi idindiza iterambere
